T07D4100-2:85b-15: skad cig mas spyod par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:85b-16: mya ngan ni sdug pa dang bral ba las byung ba'i yang dag par gdung ba'o //
T07D4100-2:85b-17: smre sngags 'don pa ni gdung ba dang ldan pa'i tshig brjod pa'o //
T07D4100-2:85b-18: sdug bsngal ba ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs lnga dang ldan pa'i tshor ba'o //
T07D4100-2:85b-19: yid mi bde ba ni yid kyi gdung ba'o //
T07D4100-2:85b-20: 'khrug pa zhes bya ba ni grang ba dang tsha ba dang /
T07D4100-2:85b-23: rlung la sogs pas zil gyis mnan cing gnod pa'o //
T07D4100-2:85b-24: skye ba dang rga ba la sogs pa ni zlas dbye ba'i bsdu ba'o //
T07D4100-2:85b-25: 'byung ba ni yang dag par skye ba'o //
T07D4100-2:85b-26: des na yang 'di ltar rnam pa 'dis dbang phyug la sogs pas bskyed pa'am /
T07D4100-2:85b-27: rgyu med pa ni ma yin no //
T07D4100-2:85b-28: 'dis zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal gyi phung spo'o //
T07D4100-2:85b-29: 'ba' zhig ces bya ba ni gcig tu bdag med pa'i phyir ram thams cad do //
T07D4100-2:85b-30: chen po zhes bya ba ni thog ma med pa'i phyir dang dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:85b-31: sdug bsngal gyi phung po zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal gyi tshogs dang /
T07D4100-2:85b-32: sdug bsngal gyi 'dus pa 'khor ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07D4100-2:85b-33: 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'grub pa'o //
T07D4100-2:85b-34: ldog pa'i dbang du byas nas bstan pa'i phyir smras pa /
T07D4100-2:85b-35: brten pa med pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:85b-36: 'gag cing bral ba med par gyur pa ste /
T07D4100-2:85b-37: sdug bsngal ldog pa'i mtshan nyid mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
T07D4100-2:86a-1: ma'i don ni sngar bshad zin to //
T07D4100-2:86a-2: 'jug pa dang ldog pa'i mtshan nyid gzhan bstan pa'i phyir smras pa /
T07D4100-2:86a-3: dge slong dag ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:86a-4: dge slong rab tu mang po bsti gnas kyi khang pa dag tu 'dus shing 'khod la /
T07D4100-2:86a-5: gang phal cher mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'brel ba'i chos gtan la 'bebs par byed de /
T07D4100-2:86a-6: de yang mya ngan las 'das pa 'dod kyang the tshom skyes par gyur to //
T07D4100-2:86a-7: ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das kyis gsan nas de'i dbang du mdzad de 'di gsungs so //
T07D4100-2:86a-8: yod do zhes bya ba ni rdzas kyi dngos por yod do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07D4100-2:86a-9: dge slong dag ces bya ba ni g-yeng ba rnam par spang ba'i phyir bod pa ste /
T07D4100-2:86a-10: gzhan du na shin tu phra ba'i don te rtogs par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:86a-12: ma skyes pa dang zhes bya ba'i ming can de'i 'dus byas dang bral pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:86a-13: ma byung ba dang zhes bya ba ni gnas pa las gzhan du gyur pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:86a-14: ma bcos pa zhes bya ba ni byas pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:86a-15: 'dus ma byas zhes bya ba ni sems pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:86a-16: mi 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni nye bar len pa'i mtshan ma dang rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:86a-17: rnam par 'gyur bar byed pa lnga dang 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid gsum mam /
T07D4100-2:86a-18: yang na phyi rol gyi sems pa med pa de dag 'di ltar bstan to //
T07D4100-2:86a-19: yang na rgol ba rnam pa lnga dang /
T07D4100-2:86a-20: sngon ma byung ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa sngon ma byung ba zhes pa ste /
T07D4100-2:86a-22: skyed byed rab sad 'jig dang zhum pa dang //
T07D4100-2:86a-23: yang yang skyo bas nyer 'gro tshangs pa ste /
T07D4100-2:86a-24: des na thar pa'i grong khyer ston byed pa //
T07D4100-2:86a-25: skyed pa 'jig pas rnam 'jig rab tu grol //
T07D4100-2:86a-27: gang 'dis ni thar pa'i cha yongs su 'dzin pa yin te /
T07D4100-2:86a-28: lam bsgom pa la sogs pa'i mthu ste sa bon
T07D4100-2:86a-29: gyi mthus myu gu bzhin du de bstsal ba yin
T07D4100-2:86a-30: te / tshig lnga po 'di dag go rims bzhin rtogs par bya'o /
T07D4100-2:86a-31: yang na 'og ma'i cha dang mthun pa lnga dang /
T07D4100-2:86a-32: gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun du sbyor ba
T07D4100-2:86b-0: rnams dang bral bar bya @86b pa'i phyir 'di gsungs
T07D4100-2:86b-1: so / yang na ma skyes pa ni skye ba ma thob pa'o //
T07D4100-2:86b-2: ma byung ba ni sems can gyi tha snyad mi g-yo ba'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:86b-3: ma bcos pa ni bcos ma'i nor bur ma gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:86b-4: 'dus ma byas ni nye bar len pa'i rgyu med pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:86b-5: mi 'byung ba ni phyi rol gyi rkyen med pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:86b-6: yang na 'gro ba lnga ba stsal ba'i phyir te /
T07D4100-2:86b-7: go rims bzhin zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni ci rigs par brjod par bya'o //
T07D4100-2:86b-8: 'dus byas kyi dngos po ni rdzas su yod par
T07D4100-2:86b-9: bstan pa'i phyir skye ba yod do zhes bya ba
T07D4100-2:86b-11: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa'i dngos po yang
T07D4100-2:86b-12: yod de de lta bas na tshul bzhin du bskyed
T07D4100-2:86b-13: cing ldog pa yang bsgrub pa'i phyir /
T07D4100-2:86b-14: dge slong dag gal te zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:86b-15: gal te med par gyur na zhes bya ba ni
T07D4100-2:86b-16: ji skad du bshad pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa
T07D4100-2:86b-18: nga ni skyes pa dang zhes bya ba ni nga
T07D4100-2:86b-19: thams cad mkhyen par gyur nas 'dus byas kyi nges
T07D4100-2:86b-20: pa 'byung ba yod de zhes mi smra pa'i phyir
T07D4100-2:86b-21: ro // gang gi phyir zhes bya ba ni rgyu gang gis so //
T07D4100-2:86b-22: 'di na zhes bya ba ni gcig tu nges par smra ba'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07D4100-2:86b-23: gang gi phyir nges par 'dus ma byas yod cing
T07D4100-2:86b-24: nges par 'byung ba yod pa de pas na nga
T07D4100-2:86b-25: nyid smra'o // gang gi phyir kun du mi shes
T07D4100-2:86b-26: pa med de ngan pa la dmigs pa'i blo med
T07D4100-2:86b-27: nyid smra'o // pa'i phyir ro // med pa'i dngos
T07D4100-2:86b-28: po yang yod pa nyid du 'jog par sangs rgyas
T07D4100-2:86b-29: mi mdzad de phyin ci ma log par ston pa'i
T07D4100-2:86b-30: phyir dang thams cad mkhyen pa yin pa'i phyir /
T07D4100-2:86b-31: bskyed pa de yang 'di ltar yod pa yin no //
T07D4100-2:86b-32: nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni nges par 'byung ba ste /
T07D4100-2:86b-33: phyi rol gyi dngos po med na ni nad nas 'byung ba mi rigs so //
T07D4100-2:86b-34: dngos po thams cad ni gnyen po dang bcas pa ma yin pa mi snang ste /
T07D4100-2:86b-35: dper na mun pa la snang ba dang /
T07D4100-2:86b-36: grang ba la dro ba dang /
T07D4100-2:86b-37: dro ba la grang ba dang /
T07D4100-2:86b-38: dri ma la lan tshva'i chu dang /
T07D4100-2:86b-39: nad la sman la sogs pa ste /
T07D4100-2:86b-40: 'khor ba rjes su myong zhing sdug bsngal du ltung
T07D4100-2:86b-41: ba yang gnyen pos rdzas kyi bdag nyid bsgom par
T07D4100-2:87a-1: par yod dam med ce na bshad pa /
T07D4100-2:87a-2: yod do zhes bya ba'i don gyis bstan to //
T07D4100-2:87a-3: da 'di nyid nges par brtag par bya ste /
T07D4100-2:87a-4: ji lta bu las mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya zhe na /
T07D4100-2:87a-5: sdug bsngal mtha' dang nges 'byung dang //
T07D4100-2:87a-6: dus dang zad pa med pa yi //
T07D4100-2:87a-7: blo ldan mya ngan 'das skyob ces //
T07D4100-2:87a-8: thub pas yang dag gsungs pa yin //
T07D4100-2:87a-9: rnam par shes pa'i mtsho la gang zhig rtag pa'i
T07D4100-2:87a-10: bdag nyid kyi rdzas yod cing dbang byed pa'i don
T07D4100-2:87a-11: ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
T07D4100-2:87a-13: dge slong dag de la rnam par shes pa ni shar phyogs su 'gro'o zhes nga mi smra'o //
T07D4100-2:87a-14: de bzhin du rnam par shes pa ni nang nas bstan du med pa /
T07D4100-2:87a-15: yangs shing rgya che bas zil gyis mi non pa ni 'dir mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
T07D4100-2:87a-16: rnam par shes pa'i sgra'o zhes bye brag tu smra ba'i 'o //
T07D4100-2:87a-17: sems kyi rgyud 'gag pa'i phyir sems kyi rgyud kyi rnam pa yin te /
T07D4100-2:87a-18: sems can re re la yang mya ngan las 'das pa'i rdzas yod do //
T07D4100-2:87a-19: gang spangs pa'i khams dang 'dod chags dang bral pa'i
T07D4100-2:87a-20: khams kyang yod do zhes ye shes la 'jug pa
T07D4100-2:87a-22: skal ba mi mnyam pa ni 'gog pa yin no zhes mdo las gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:87a-23: kun du sbyor ba'i rdzas dag ni 'gog pa ma yin no //
T07D4100-2:87a-24: mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgrib par gyur pa nyon
T07D4100-2:87a-25: mongs pa rnams kyang gnyen po du mas sgrub pa'i
T07D4100-2:87a-26: phyir te / nyon mongs pa mang ba'i phyir gnyen
T07D4100-2:87a-27: po bsgom pa mang pos mya ngan las 'das pa
T07D4100-2:87a-28: phyir te / mang ba'i phyir / sha shthi dza
T07D4100-2:87a-29: na sa ra ka zhes bya ba 'dir brjod par
T07D4100-2:87a-30: phyir te / mang ba'i phyir / bya'o // mya ngan las 'das pa rdzas su yod de /
T07D4100-2:87a-31: mngon sum gyi yul yin pa'i phyir gzugs bzhin no //
T07D4100-2:87a-32: yod pa'i phyir btags pa bzhin no //
T07D4100-2:87a-33: skye ba yod ces bya ba dang /
T07D4100-2:87a-34: mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i lam yod ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T07D4100-2:87a-35: chos can 'jig pa med pa'i khyad par gyis so //
T07D4100-2:87a-36: khyim bdag gzugs ni 'jig pa'i chos can yin la
T07D4100-2:87a-37: 'gog pa dang mya ngan las 'das pa ni 'jig
T07D4100-2:87a-38: pa'i chos can ma yin no zhes mdo las gsungs
T07D4100-2:87a-39: so // blo khyad par can gyi gzhis de'i don bya bar yang snang ste /
T07D4100-2:87b-0: yid bzhin gyi @87b nor bu bzhin no //
T07D4100-2:87b-1: mchog tu bcas pa'i chos bstan pa ni 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:87b-2: 'di ltar sems ni nyon mongs las kyi zhags pa dam pos bcings //
T07D4100-2:87b-3: de dang bral zhing grol bas grol ba'ang de nyid de //
T07D4100-2:87b-4: lus can btson ra dag las thag ring gyur na ni //
T07D4100-2:87b-5: 'jig rten thar pa 'dod de btson ra lta bur mis //
T07D4100-2:87b-6: 'dod dang mi 'dod de ltar mkhas pas shes bya ste //
T07D4100-2:87b-7: grags dang ma grags spang na mya ngan 'das pa 'thob //
T07D4100-2:87b-9: re zhig so so'i skye bo'i tshogs ni 'khor ba
T07D4100-2:87b-10: la dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du yin zhing mi
T07D4100-2:87b-12: 'gog pa ni skyon dang bral ba'o //
T07D4100-2:87b-13: de bzhin nyid rtogs pa'i mig gis ni lha'i bu
T07D4100-2:87b-14: mo la bltas na yang blo dga' ba med par
T07D4100-2:87b-15: 'gyur ro // bshad gci dang ni rga dang nad //
T07D4100-2:87b-16: dug gis brgyal ba'i 'bras bu ngan //
T07D4100-2:87b-17: gzhan zas lang tsho nad med dang //
T07D4100-2:87b-18: phun sum tshogs pa'i dngos po dag / dka' yang mkhas pa dag gis ni //
T07D4100-2:87b-19: snga phyi yongs su brtag bya ste //
T07D4100-2:87b-20: dga' bar mi bya rigs btsun rta //
T07D4100-2:87b-21: mtshan dang bral ba ji bzhin no //
T07D4100-2:87b-22: rigs dang mi rtag grol ba ste //
T07D4100-2:87b-23: de bzhin lung gi bya bas kyang //
T07D4100-2:87b-24: blo ldan the tshom bral ba yis //
T07D4100-2:87b-25: rdzas ni yang dag nges shes bya //
T07D4100-2:87b-26: dngos po thams cad rtogs pa yi //
T07D4100-2:87b-27: blo ni rang bzhin gyis spel zhing //
T07D4100-2:87b-28: blo dang ldan pas blo gros ni //
T07D4100-2:87b-29: 'bad pas yongs su bskyed par bya //
T07D4100-2:87b-31: 'dir gzhung mangs kyis dogs nas yang ma bris so//
T07D4100-2:87b-32: ji skad du bshad pa'i 'jug pa dang ldog pa
T07D4100-2:87b-33: gnyis blang ba dang spang ba nyid du sgrub pa'i
T07D4100-2:87b-34: phyir / skyes dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T07D4100-2:87b-35: lnga po 'di'i rnam par 'grel pa ni bshad zin to //
T07D4100-2:87b-36: mi brtan pa zhes bya ba ni mi rtag pa'i gnas skabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:87b-37: gnas skabs mi rtag pa bstan nas ris mthun pa'i mi rtag pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T07D4100-2:87b-38: rga dang 'chi ba zhes bya ba smos te /
T07D4100-2:87b-39: rga ba dang 'chi ba gnyis kyis ni kun du bcom zhing gnod pa byed de /
T07D4100-2:87b-40: dga' ba dang 'chi bas kun du bcom pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:88a-0: rmongs pa'i chos can zhes bya ba @88a * //
T07D4100-2:88a-1: ni sdug pa dang bral ba'i chos yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:88a-2: yang na gzhan las rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:88a-3: mi sdug pa dang phrad pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T07D4100-2:88a-4: rab tu 'jig 'gyur ba zhes bya ba smos te /
T07D4100-2:88a-5: rab tu dga' bas 'jig par 'gyur ba ste /
T07D4100-2:88a-6: dga' ba rnam par nyams pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:88a-7: zas kyi rgyu las byung ba yi //
T07D4100-2:88a-8: zhes bya ba ni zas kyi rgyur gyur pas mkhas
T07D4100-2:88a-9: pa rab tu 'byung zhing gnas pa 'di la yod
T07D4100-2:88a-10: pa ste / gzhan la rag lus pas 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07D4100-2:88a-11: 'gro ba zas kyis gnas pa zhes bya ba'i tshig
T07D4100-2:88a-12: gis zas med par gnas pa med pa'i phyir ro
T07D4100-2:88a-13: // zas de yang sdug bsngal gyi rkyen dang sdug
T07D4100-2:88a-14: bsngal gyi rgyu nyid yin zhing sdug bsngal nyid skye
T07D4100-2:88a-15: // ba yin te / ji skad du mi rtag
T07D4100-2:88a-16: pa'i rgyu dang rkyen la brten na ji ltar rtag
T07D4100-2:88a-18: skyes dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i tshig drug
T07D4100-2:88a-19: gis gang bstan pa'i 'dus byas kyi dngos po de
T07D4100-2:88a-23: de la go rims bzhin du rgyu drug bstan pa'i phyir /
T07D4100-2:88a-24: rga dang 'chi ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
T07D4100-2:88a-25: 'dir nus pa nyams pa ste rga ba'o //
T07D4100-2:88a-26: nad kyang nus pa 'grib par byed pa ste /
T07D4100-2:88a-28: rga ba dang 'chi ba ni rga shi ste /
T07D4100-2:88a-29: des kun du bcom pa ni skye ba'i dngos po ste /
T07D4100-2:88a-30: de yang yongs su spang bar bya'o //
T07D4100-2:88a-31: 'o na tsam pa ka la sogs pa'i me tog
T07D4100-2:88a-32: de yongs su thu bar byed kyi spang bar mi
T07D4100-2:88a-33: byed na de ji ltar zhe na /
T07D4100-2:88a-34: rga ba'i chos can yin pa'i phyir te skyes nas
T07D4100-2:88a-35: rnying bar mi 'gyur ba med do zhes pas spang
T07D4100-2:88a-37: gang byung bar gyur pa de yang spang bar bya ba yin no //
T07D4100-2:88a-38: 'o na nad med par gyur pa yang yang dag
T07D4100-2:88a-39: par yongs su bsrung ba de ci'i phyir zhe na
T07D4100-2:88a-40: / na ba'i chos can yin pa'i phyir te /
T07D4100-2:88a-41: nad med pa thams cad kyi mtha' yang nad yin no zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //
T07D4100-2:88a-42: gang yang 'byung ba de yang spang bar bya'o //
T07D4100-2:88a-43: 'o na skyes bu'i bu de ni gang gis kyang bor ba med do zhe na /
T07D4100-2:88a-44: 'chi ba'i chos can yin pa'i phyir te /
T07D4100-2:88b-0: gal te skyes nas 'chi bar mi rigs @88b na de lta ma yin pas so //
T07D4100-2:88b-1: bcos pa gang yin pa yang spang bar bya ba nyid do //
T07D4100-2:88b-2: 'o na bum pa la sogs pa byas nas kyang len pa yin no zhe na /
T07D4100-2:88b-3: rmongs pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir gang gzhan gyis
T07D4100-2:88b-4: bskyed pa de ni nges par 'jig pa yin te
T07D4100-2:88b-5: / bcos ma'i nor bu bzhin no //
T07D4100-2:88b-6: gang 'dus byas de dang de ni spang bar bya ba yin no //
T07D4100-2:88b-7: 'o na dgos par gnas pa de ni spang bar mi rigs te /
T07D4100-2:88b-8: sems la sten par byed pa ma dang 'dra bas
T07D4100-2:88b-9: de yang rab tu 'jig par 'gyur ba'i phyir te
T07D4100-2:88b-10: bsal ba'o // gang rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ba
T07D4100-2:88b-11: de ni mi 'dor ba yin na de ni lugs
T07D4100-2:88b-12: las bzlog pa ma yin no //
T07D4100-2:88b-13: gang mi brtan pa de yang spang bar bya ba ma yin te /
T07D4100-2:88b-15: zas tsam gyis rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:88b-16: dper na spre'u ni me rno ba yod pas zas
T07D4100-2:88b-17: kyi don du phal cher kun du g-yo zhing mi
T07D4100-2:88b-18: brtan pa lta bu mkhas pas spang bar bya'o //
T07D4100-2:88b-19: de bzhin du 'dus byas kyang zas yod na gnas par 'gyur gyi /
T07D4100-2:88b-20: gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T07D4100-2:88b-22: zhes bya ba ni de ltar 'dus byas kyi dngos
T07D4100-2:88b-23: po la don du gnyer ba dang nye bar len
T07D4100-2:88b-25: gang gi phyir khyad par gsum gyis ni don du gnyer bar bya ste /
T07D4100-2:88b-27: rga ba dang 'chi ba med pa'i phyir dang /
T07D4100-2:88b-28: gzhan la rag lus pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:88b-29: de la yang 'dir mi 'byung ba ni snga ma phyed kyis so //
T07D4100-2:88b-30: rga ba dang 'chi bas kun du bcom pas ni lhag ma bstan to //

T07D4100-2:102a-5: 'dod pa longs spyod pas ni ma yin no zhes bya ba nas /

T07D4100-2:102a-7: 'dod par zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i phyir ram de'i lus la'o //
T07D4100-2:102a-8: gang kun du sbyor pas byas pa'i kun du 'brel pa ni rab tu chags pa dang /
T07D4100-2:102a-11: de la chags pa ni rab tu zhen pa ste /
T07D4100-2:102a-13: bsags pa dang srung ba la sogs pa'i 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07D4100-2:102a-14: yang na kun du sbyor pa'i bdag nyid de chags pa dang /
T07D4100-2:102a-16: snying rje yang chags pa dang tshul 'dra ba yin no zhe na /
T07D4100-2:102a-17: kun du sbyor ba zhes smos pa'i phyir chags pa ni /
T07D4100-2:102a-18: sems can gyi 'ching ba yin par bstan te /
T07D4100-2:102a-19: mi shes pa sngon du 'gro ba'i g-yeng ba dang /
T07D4100-2:102a-20: chags pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07D4100-2:102a-21: kun du sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni rgyal po

T07D4100-2:102a-24: chags pa dang sred pa'i bdag nyid du shes par
T07D4100-2:102a-25: bya'o // gang kun du sbyor ba dag la skyon
T07D4100-2:102a-26: dang nyes par ma rtogs pa de nyid mi shes
T07D4100-2:102a-27: pas gnas shing chags pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:102a-28: gang yang de ltar 'dod pa'i kun du sbyor bas
T07D4100-2:102a-29: 'dod pa la sred cing chags par gyur na ni
T07D4100-2:102a-30: nam du yang 'dod pa'i chu bo dang 'dod pa'i

T07D4100-2:102a-33: mngon par mi 'dod pa'i gnas su khyer bar byed pa'i phyir chu bo'o //

T07D4100-2:102a-35: yangs pa zhes bya ba ste /

T07D4100-2:102a-38: shes pa zag pa med pa'i snying pos spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:102a-39: de lta na yang chu bo rnam pa bzhi po

T07D4100-2:102b-0: chags bral mchog ces bya ba ni gong ma'i @102b kun du sbyor ba spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:102b-1: chags bral tha ma zhes bya ba ni 'og ma'i cha'i kun du sbyor ba spangs pa'i phyir ro //

T07D4100-2:102b-3: mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang /
T07D4100-2:102b-4: bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba sngon du 'gro ba yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T07D4100-2:102b-5: 'di la zhes bya ba smos te /

T07D4100-2:102b-7: go rims bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa dag la bdag tu mngon par zhen pa'o //
T07D4100-2:102b-8: yang na gzugs zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i bdag
T07D4100-2:102b-9: nyid kyi mngon par 'dod pa'i 'jig tshogs la lta
T07D4100-2:102b-10: ba'i ri'i rtse mo nyi shu bstan te /
T07D4100-2:102b-11: de yang med pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //

T07D4100-2:102b-13: blta ba dang kun du sbyor ba thams cad sbangs pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:102b-14: de ltar rnam grol zhes bya ba ni rnam pa
T07D4100-2:102b-15: 'dis ris gnyis kyi phra rgyas spangs pa'i phyir gang
T07D4100-2:102b-17: de nyid gang chu bo las de ltar rnam par grol ba ste /
T07D4100-2:102b-18: rgal ba ni rgal bar 'gyur ba'o //
T07D4100-2:102b-19: sngon chad ma brgal ba zhes bya ba ni sngon
T07D4100-2:102b-20: nam yang ma spangs pa ste srid pa gsum gyi
T07D4100-2:102b-21: chu bo ma spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:102b-22: ci'i phyir chu bo rgal bar byed ce na /
T07D4100-2:102b-23: yang srid pa med pa'i phyir zhes bstan pa ste yang mi skye bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
T07D4100-2:102b-24: sdug bsngal las ldog pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //

T07D4100-2:102b-26: khyim gyi gnas yongs su spangs pa tsam gyis ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T07D4100-2:102b-27: gang zhig tshal spangs zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:102b-28: khyim gyi gnas kyis yongs su skyo ba'i tshong dpon
T07D4100-2:102b-29: rgan po zhig / dgon par song ste rab tu
T07D4100-2:102b-30: byung nas phyir ldog cing nyams par gyur la /

T07D4100-2:102b-32: gzhan dag ni 'od ma'i tshal na rab tu byung
T07D4100-2:102b-33: ba rnam par 'phrul pa ming med pa zhig gnas
T07D4100-2:102b-34: te / gnas la lhag par chags pa de'i dbang du mdzad do zhes zer ro //
T07D4100-2:103a-0: de la re zhig 'di ji bzhin pa'i don @103a * //
T07D4100-2:103a-3: de la gang gnas pa ni nags tshal na gnas pa ste /
T07D4100-2:103a-4: dgon pa na gnas shing khyim la sred pa med pa gang yin ba de'o //
T07D4100-2:103a-5: nags tshal spangs pa ni rab tu byung ba la
T07D4100-2:103a-6: mngon par mi dga' bar gyur nas nyams par gyur
T07D4100-2:103a-7: pa ste / yang na nags tshal spangs nas khyim na gnas par gyur pa'o //

T07D4100-2:103a-9: nags su rgyug ces bya ba ni dgon pa nyid du phyogs pa ste /

T07D4100-2:103a-14: tshur zhes bya ba ni tshur shog la ltos shig pa'o //
T07D4100-2:103a-15: gang gi rnam par blta bar bya zhe na /
T07D4100-2:103a-16: grol bar 'ching bar rgyug pa'i zhes bya ba ste /
T07D4100-2:103a-17: rab tu byung ba yongs su gzung ba med pa khyim nas nges par byung ste /
T07D4100-2:103a-18: yang de nyid du mi gtsang ba la sogs pa

T07D4100-2:103a-25: // ro // de ni khyim ste bya ba ngan
T07D4100-2:103a-26: pa la sogs pa de ni khyim gyi gnas la

T07D4100-2:103a-31: khyim rjes su myong ba las rgan pa'i gnas skabs kyis skyo ba skyes pa dang /
T07D4100-2:103a-33: de la ma chags par byed cing rab tu byung ba ste /
T07D4100-2:103a-34: de'i skyon dang bral bar 'dod pas so //
T07D4100-2:103a-35: des tshal med ba zhes bya ba smos te /
T07D4100-2:103a-36: tshal dang bral ba ni tshal spangs pa ste /
T07D4100-2:103a-37: khyim gyi gnas nas byung zhing rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07D4100-2:103b-0: lus kyi dben pa 'dis bstan @103b nas sems kyi dben pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T07D4100-2:103b-1: nags tshal spangs nas zhes bya ba smos te /
T07D4100-2:103b-2: 'dir nags tshal ni 'dod pa la sogs pa la rnam par rtog pa ste /
T07D4100-2:103b-3: de ni khyim gyi nags stug por 'jug pa yin no //
T07D4100-2:103b-4: de spangs pa ni 'du 'dzi dang rnam par rtog pa spangs pa'i phyir ro //

T07D4100-2:103b-7: yang na gtsug lag khang la lhag par zhen pa'o //
T07D4100-2:103b-8: 'di la ltos shig ces bya ba ni nyon mongs pas 'khrul par byas shing /
T07D4100-2:103b-9: mi rtag pa'i bden pas kun du 'phyan pa'i sems can la ltos shig pa'o //
T07D4100-2:103b-10: tshur zhes bya ba ni khyed cag tshur shog shig dang /

T07D4100-2:103b-12: chos 'di rtogs pa'i phyir de kho na nyid brtag cing bde 'gro blta ba ni /
T07D4100-2:103b-13: de bzhin nyid kyis yin gyi /
T07D4100-2:103b-14: gzhan gyis ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'di'i don to //
T07D4100-2:103b-15: gzhan ni snga ma bzhin no //
T07D4100-2:103b-16: gang gis sred pa'i 'ching ba las grol bar 'gyur zhe na /

T07D4100-2:103b-20: de nas rgyal po'i bu mo kshe ma zhes bya
T07D4100-2:103b-21: ba shing rta la zhon te bcom ldan 'das lta

T07D4100-2:103b-27: rin po che sna tshogs kyis 'bar bar byas pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:103b-28: dkar ba ni kha dog dkar ba nyid do //

T07D4100-2:103b-30: yang na gos dkar pos g-yogs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:103b-31: gang yang bud med shing rta la zhon par gyur
T07D4100-2:103b-32: pa ni phal cher gos dkar pos g-yogs par byed
T07D4100-2:103b-33: do // mthun pa'i rtsibs zhes bya ba ni gcig
T07D4100-2:104a-0: tu bsngags shing gtso bor gyur pa'i shing @104a *

T07D4100-2:104a-14: shing rta la zhon zhing 'gro ba nges par bsags
T07D4100-2:104a-16: lha sbyin dmyal bar skyes pa bstan pa yin no //
T07D4100-2:104a-17: rgyun rnams gcad par gyis zhes bya ba ni las kyi rgyun spangs pa ste /
T07D4100-2:104a-18: nyon mongs pa ni ri bo mthon po las 'bab pa'i chu rgyun 'dra ba de'o //
T07D4100-2:104a-19: las dang nyon mongs pa'i rgyu med pa dang las de'i 'bras bu yang med do //
T07D4100-2:104a-20: chings ma zhes bya ba ni yang nying mtshams sbyor
T07D4100-2:104a-21: ba'i 'ching ba med na de'i phyir las dang nyon
T07D4100-2:104a-22: mongs pa yang med pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:104a-23: sgra ji bzhin du bshad nas /
T07D4100-2:104a-24: gzhan la bstan nas bshad pa /

T07D4100-2:104a-26: de ni lam gyi gzhi dang them skas su gyur pa nyid de /
T07D4100-2:104a-28: las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba zhes bya ba'i yan lag ni tshul khrims kyi rang bzhin no //
T07D4100-2:104a-29: gos dkar g-yogs zhes bya ba ni yang dag par
T07D4100-2:104a-30: grol ba dang yang dag pa'i shes pa zhes bya
T07D4100-2:104a-31: ba 'di'i tshig bla dags yin te /

T07D4100-2:104a-34: mthun pa'i rtsibs zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /

T07D4100-2:104a-36: ting nge 'dzin gyi tshig bla dags so //

T07D4100-2:104b-0: shing rta ni yang dag pa'i @104b lta ba ste /

T07D4100-2:112a-0: @112a * // yang na sdig pas ston par byed cing gnas pas 'dul bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:112a-1: snod kyi khyad par yongs su mi shes pa'i phyir dang /

T07D4100-2:112a-5: yang na yon tan dang skyon gyi khyad par shes pa'i phyir /

T07D4100-2:112a-7: de lta bu ni sems can de lta bu'o //

T07D4100-2:112a-10: de lta bu dag ces bya ba smos te /

T07D4100-2:112a-14: sdig mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni nyes par mi 'gyur ba'o//
T07D4100-2:112a-15: yon tan la bsten pa nyid kyis ni sdig pa sel bar 'gyur gyi /
T07D4100-2:112a-16: dka' thub la sogs pas ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T07D4100-2:112a-17: nye bar zhi zhing zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:112a-18: ri gangs can na dka' thub mchog tu byed cing
T07D4100-2:112a-19: sdig pa zad par bya ba'i phyir drang srong rgan
T07D4100-2:112a-20: po dag dka' thub byed pa gzigs nas bcom ldan

T07D4100-2:112a-26: khengs med pa zhes bya ba ni smra bas khyad
T07D4100-2:112a-27: par du yid yongs su 'phyar ba med pa'i phyir
T07D4100-2:112a-28: ro // yang na nye bar zhi ba ni yid kyis nyes bar spyod pa spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:112a-29: rab zhi zhes bya ba ni lus kyis nyes par spyod pa spangs pas so //

T07D4100-2:112a-32: yang na ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa'i phyir nye bar zhi ba dang ldan pa'o //
T07D4100-2:112a-33: sdig pa'i chos rnams sprug byed de //

T07D4100-2:112b-1: 'khor ba pa'i nyes par spyod pa spong ba'o //
T07D4100-2:112b-3: rlung gis ljon shing lo ma bzhin //
T07D4100-2:112b-5: dper na shing gi 'dab ma rlung gi shugs drag pos kun du sprugs pa bzhin du'o //
T07D4100-2:112b-6: sdig pa thams cad dang bral ba'i gang zag la
T07D4100-2:112b-7: ni gang skyon brjod pa de dang de bdag nyid

T07D4100-2:112b-9: pa'i phyir / gang zhig skyes bu zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //

T07D4100-2:112b-16: gang zhig ces bya ba ni khyim pa 'am rab tu byung ba gang dag go //

T07D4100-2:112b-18: sdang gis ma nyams pa'i yid yod pa ste sems

T07D4100-2:113a-7: rdzi phyogs zhes bya ba ni rlung mngon du phyogs pa'o //

T07D4100-2:113a-11: 'di ltar dge ba byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T07D4100-2:113a-12: 'dis ni chos nyid kyi rigs pa bstan pa yin no //
T07D4100-2:113a-13: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang lha sbyin gnyis sh'akya'i rigs las byung ngo //
T07D4100-2:113a-14: de las bdag nyid chen po kun dga' bo ni
T07D4100-2:113a-15: chos 'dzin cing bcom ldan 'das kyi nye gnas su
T07D4100-2:113a-16: gyur to // bdag nyid chen po lha sbyin ni sdig pa byas pas mnar med par skyes te /

T07D4100-2:113a-18: mtshon byin di pa la stong phrag brgyad cu dang /

T07D4100-2:113a-35: ni yid du 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mthong bar 'gyur

T07D4100-2:113b-0: bdag @113b la dge ba dang sdig par mi 'gyur

T07D4100-2:122a-3: // / sdig pa mtha' dag spangs shing legs par spyod

T07D4100-2:122a-5: gis 'jig rten pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa

T07D4100-2:122a-10: zung gi skabs yin pas da yang de nyid phal

T07D4100-2:122a-14: to // brtsams pa'o // de srid snang zhes bya

T07D4100-2:122a-16: gsal bar byed de bdag dang bdag gi gzhi'i phyogs
T07D4100-2:122a-17: tsam gsal bar nus pa yin no //
T07D4100-2:122a-19: srin bu me khyer zhes bya ba ste /

T07D4100-2:122a-21: ji srid nyi ma ma shar ba //
T07D4100-2:122a-22: zhes bya ba ni dus ji srid kyi bar du
T07D4100-2:122a-23: nyi ma shar cing 'od zer stong ldan ma byung

T07D4100-2:122a-25: zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' la nyi ma sprin
T07D4100-2:122a-26: la sogs pa'i sgrib pa med par gyur nas shar
T07D4100-2:122a-28: de byung zhing gsal bar byed pa na srin bu
T07D4100-2:122a-29: me khyer sngon por 'gyur ro zhes sbyar bar bya'o
T07D4100-2:122a-30: // rnam par snang bar byed pa yin pas na nyi ma ste /
T07D4100-2:122a-31: mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa dag gsal bar byed ces pa'i don to //
T07D4100-2:122a-32: yang na snang ba thams cad mngon par zil gyis gnon par byed pa'o //
T07D4100-2:122a-33: sngon por 'gyur zhes bya ba ni 'od zer stong
T07D4100-2:122a-34: ldan 'byung bar gyur na srin bu me khyer 'od
T07D4100-2:122a-36: chen pos chung du zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:122a-37: ji ltar sngon por gyur ce na /
T07D4100-2:122a-38: 'di ltar snang ba med ces bya ba smos te /
T07D4100-2:122a-39: dang gi sgra ni gang gi phyir //
T07D4100-2:122a-42: gang phyir de ni sngon bzhin du snang ba med par 'gyur ro //
T07D4100-2:122a-43: dpe bstan nas de bsgrub par bya ba'i don smras pa /
T07D4100-2:122b-0: snang zhes bya ba ste snang bar byed @122b pa yin pas snang ba'o //
T07D4100-2:122b-1: rang gi grub pa'i mtha' gsal bar byed pa yin par gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07D4100-2:122b-2: gang snang zhing gsal bar byed pa yin zhe na /
T07D4100-2:122b-3: rtog ge pa rnams zhes bya ba smos te /
T07D4100-2:122b-4: rdzogs byad la sogs pa 'jig rten pa rnams kyis brjod pa'i mkhas pa'o //
T07D4100-2:122b-5: rtog pas gnas pa ni rtog ge pa ste /
T07D4100-2:122b-6: don mngon sum du ma byas pa'i phyir rang gi
T07D4100-2:122b-7: lung la sogs pa tsam la rjes su 'jug pa'o
T07D4100-2:122b-8: // gang ji tsam gyi bar du zhe na /
T07D4100-2:122b-9: ji srid de bzhin gshegs ma shar //
T07D4100-2:122b-11: dus ji srid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma byung gi bar du'o //
T07D4100-2:122b-12: de bzhin nyid kyi don thams cad thugs su chud pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:122b-13: 'jig rten rdzogs sangs rgyas shar ba //
T07D4100-2:122b-14: zhes bya ba ni mtha' dag thugs su chud pa'i phyir rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te /
T07D4100-2:122b-15: gang gi phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten
T07D4100-2:122b-16: du byung ba de'i bstan pa'i 'od kyis gsal bar
T07D4100-2:122b-17: byed pa las rab tu rtogs pas yang dag gdul
T07D4100-2:122b-18: bya'i 'jig rten dri ma med par gyur pa'o //
T07D4100-2:122b-19: rtog can mi snang zhes bya ba ni mang po'i nang na gcig kyang mdzes pa ma yin no //
T07D4100-2:122b-20: nyan thos mi snang zhes bya ba ni rtog pa
T07D4100-2:122b-21: can de'i tshig gi rjes su 'brang ba yang mi
T07D4100-2:122b-22: snang ba'o // yang dag par rtogs pa dang log
T07D4100-2:122b-23: par rtogs pas yang dag pa dang log pa la
T07D4100-2:122b-24: mngon par zhen par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir
T07D4100-2:122b-25: snang ba'o // / gces min zhes bya ba la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gnyis so //
T07D4100-2:122b-31: gtam snying por byed pa ni 'di la dge slong 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa dang /
T07D4100-2:122b-32: zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang /
T07D4100-2:122b-33: chos thams cad bdag med pa dang /
T07D4100-2:122b-34: mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes gtam brjod pa'o //
T07D4100-2:122b-35: 'di nyid kyis lta ba thob par 'gyur ba dang /
T07D4100-2:122b-36: 'di nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba dang /
T07D4100-2:122b-37: 'di nyid yid la byas na sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'o //
T07D4100-2:123a-0: gces min zhes bya ba ni mi brtan zhing mi rtag pa dang @123a * //
T07D4100-2:123a-1: bdag med pa la sogs pa'i tshul gyi dngos po ste 'khor ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07D4100-2:123a-2: gces par blos 'dzin cing zhes bya ba ni gang
T07D4100-2:123a-3: 'di la snying po yod bar blos 'dzin pa de
T07D4100-2:123a-4: ni de ste / nges par 'byung ba la sogs pa la phyin ci log skyed pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:123a-5: gces la gces par mi rtog pa //
T07D4100-2:123a-7: 'dir mya ngan las 'das pa ni gces pa ste /
T07D4100-2:123a-8: dge zhing rtag pa'i phyir dang /
T07D4100-2:123a-10: de na 'dod pa'i longs spyod la sogs pa'i 'byor
T07D4100-2:123a-11: pa med pa'i phyir snying po ma yin par 'du
T07D4100-2:123a-12: shes pa'o // 'di la snying por 'du shes gang la yod pa de ni gces par rtog pa'o //
T07D4100-2:123a-13: gces pa ma yin par rtog pa ni gces min rtog pa'o //
T07D4100-2:123a-14: de thob par byed pa'i lam gyi thabs kyang med de /
T07D4100-2:123a-15: de lta bu'i blo dang ldan pa ni gces pa
T07D4100-2:123a-16: las gces pa ma yin par rtog pa nyid do
T07D4100-2:123a-17: // des ni gces pa thob mi 'gyur //
T07D4100-2:123a-18: zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa 'am de'i lam mi 'thob pa ste /
T07D4100-2:123a-19: de la grol ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:123a-22: log par kun rtog spyod yul can //
T07D4100-2:123a-24: log par nges par rtog pa'i spyod yul dang dmigs pa gang la yod pa de nyid do //
T07D4100-2:123a-25: yang na tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa shas che ba'o //
T07D4100-2:123a-26: gces la gces par 'du shes pa //
T07D4100-2:123a-27: zhes bya ba ni gang yang mya ngan la sogs
T07D4100-2:123a-28: pa'i don snying po dang mchog dang thabs su shes
T07D4100-2:123a-29: pa'o // gces pa ma yin pa la yang gces pa min pa zhes bya bar shes pa'o //
T07D4100-2:123a-30: legs par kun rtog spyod yul can //
T07D4100-2:123a-31: zhes bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'i yul can te /
T07D4100-2:123a-32: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la gnas pa'i spyod yul can yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:123a-33: log pa la mngon par zhen pas ni gces pa
T07D4100-2:123a-34: mi 'thob cing phung khrol skyes pa yin no zhes
T07D4100-2:123a-35: bstan pa'i phyir / 'di na lta dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T07D4100-2:123a-36: mnyan yod na zla ba bzhi pa'i ku mu da'i
T07D4100-2:123a-37: dga' ston la bab pa na rgyal byed kyi tshal
T07D4100-2:123a-38: nas mnyan yod kyi bar du mtshan mo mar me
T07D4100-2:123b-0: de na skye bo'i tshogs 'ong ba ngang @123b 'gro
T07D4100-2:123b-1: ba dag gi mu stegs can gyi mar me dang
T07D4100-2:123b-2: / lha bshos dag la phye ma leb ltung ba
T07D4100-2:123b-3: mthong nas ltung ngo ltung ngo zhes smras pa las
T07D4100-2:123b-5: 'khor ba ni nye bar len pas nye bar gzung ba ste /
T07D4100-2:123b-6: 'dod pa la sogs pa nye bar len cing 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07D4100-2:123b-7: rgyug pa zhes bya ba ni las des byas shing
T07D4100-2:123b-8: bskul ba'i dbang gis 'jig rten 'di nas pha rol
T07D4100-2:123b-11: thar pa'am de'i lam thob par mi 'gyur ba'i don to //
T07D4100-2:123b-12: gzhan dag tu ni pha rol phyin par mi 'gyur ro zhes brjod do//
T07D4100-2:123b-13: chings ma gsar dang gsar du 'phel ba dag /
T07D4100-2:123b-14: ces bya ba la 'dir las dang nyon mongs pa
T07D4100-2:123b-16: skye bo de dag ni las kyi 'ching ba gsum gyis bcings so zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //
T07D4100-2:123b-17: nyon mongs pa dang las kyi 'ching ba ni sngon
T07D4100-2:123b-18: ma byung zhing ma byung ba rjes su 'ong bas
T07D4100-2:123b-19: chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po 'phel zhing sogs
T07D4100-2:123b-20: pa'o // me nang zhes bya ba ni pad tli
T07D4100-2:123b-21: ga to zhes bya ba 'gro ba la zer te
T07D4100-2:123b-22: pa'o // / me zhes bya ba dang 'dir sbyar ro //
T07D4100-2:123b-23: khyad par du gdung bar byed pa ni 'dir me ste /
T07D4100-2:123b-24: dmyal ba zhes bya ba'i don to //

T07D4100-2:123b-28: phye ma leb dang 'dra zhes bya ba dper na phye ma leb ji ltar 'gro ba'o //
T07D4100-2:123b-30: me nang zhes bya ba ste /
T07D4100-2:123b-31: sgron ma la sogs pa'i mer zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07D4100-2:123b-32: de ltar 'khor bar 'khyam pa'i rgyu gang yin zhe na /
T07D4100-2:123b-34: lta dang nyan dang zhes bya ba la lta ba ni mthong ba ste /
T07D4100-2:123b-35: 'jig tshogs la lta ba la gnas pa'o //
T07D4100-2:123b-36: de la mngon par zhen pa ni lhag par chags pa ste /

T07D4100-2:123b-39: de dang phyin ci log gi blos grub cing rjes su gnas te 'khor bar 'khor ba'o //
T07D4100-2:123b-40: yang na lta ba ni da ltar byung ba la'o //
T07D4100-2:123b-41: thos pa ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa la'o //

T07D4100-2:123b-43: la sogs pa rjes su myong ba na mi rtag

T07D4100-2:124a-3: la 'jug pa dang zas gcod pa la sogs pa

T07D4100-2:124a-5: thob pa la lhag par chags pa yin no //

T07D4100-2:124a-9: 'jig rten 'di ni zhes bya ba ni gcig tu
T07D4100-2:124a-10: de ltar yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyang yang
T07D4100-2:124a-11: dag par yod pa'i phyir ro ;
T07D4100-2:124a-12: / yang dag pa'i yid la byed pas ni the
T07D4100-2:124a-13: tshom dang bral zhing g-yang sar lhung ba las ldog
T07D4100-2:124a-14: pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir 'di la myong
T07D4100-2:124a-15: 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T07D4100-2:124a-16: tshe dang ldan pa nam gru la the tshom dang
T07D4100-2:124a-17: 'gyod pa gang ci yang yod pa de thams cad
T07D4100-2:124a-18: 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bus bsal zhing ji tsam na

T07D4100-2:124a-21: the tshom zhes bya ba ni yid gnyis so //
T07D4100-2:124a-22: ji snyed pa zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal mthong
T07D4100-2:124a-23: bas spang bar bya ba la sogs pa mtha' dag
T07D4100-2:124a-24: go // 'di na zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten 'di na'o //
T07D4100-2:124a-25: tha dad pa ni so so ba ste 'jig rten
T07D4100-2:124a-26: gzhan dag tu yang 'di'i bden pa'i yul yin pa'i
T07D4100-2:124a-27: phyir ro // yang na nang dang phyi rol gyi gnas la'o //
T07D4100-2:124a-28: yang na bdag nyid dam gzhan la'o //
T07D4100-2:124a-29: 'di la myong 'gyur zhes bya ba myong bar byed pa yin pas myong ba ste /
T07D4100-2:124a-30: gang tshe 'di nyid la smin pa'o //
T07D4100-2:124a-31: gzhan du myong bar byed pa yin pas gzhan du myong bar 'gyur ro //
T07D4100-2:124a-32: rang gi rgyud la rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ster ba dang /
T07D4100-2:124a-33: gzhan gyi rgyud la bdag po'i 'bras bu ster ba'o //
T07D4100-2:124a-34: yang na 'dzin par byed pa'i rim pas so //
T07D4100-2:124a-35: 'di la myong byed pa zhes bya bar gzhan dag tu brjod de /
T07D4100-2:124a-36: mthong ba'i chos la myong bar 'gyur ba'o //
T07D4100-2:124a-37: gzhan la myong 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba'o //
T07D4100-2:124a-38: de dag sems par byed pas rab tu spong zhes bya bas ni the tshom mtha' dag go //
T07D4100-2:124b-0: sems par byed pa ni @124b rnal 'byor te yang dag pa yid la byed pas 'jug pa'o //
T07D4100-2:124b-1: rab tu rnam par spong ba zhes bya ba ni
T07D4100-2:124b-2: gnyen po'i khyad par gyi mthus yongs su 'dor ba'o
T07D4100-2:124b-3: // re zhig dgag pa'i gnyen po bstan pa'i phyir 'bad pa zhes bya ba smos te /
T07D4100-2:124b-4: yang dag par spong ba bzhi bsgoms pas so //
T07D4100-2:124b-5: gtan nas 'byin pa'i gnyen po bstan pa'i phyir //
T07D4100-2:124b-6: tshangs spyod spyod pa dang zhes bya ba smos te /
T07D4100-2:124b-8: gang dag de ltar 'jug pa nyid ni drang srong
T07D4100-2:124b-9: chen po'i cha byad rigs pa yin no zhes bstan
T07D4100-2:124b-10: pa'i phyir / gang zhig snyigs ma yod bzhin du ;
T07D4100-2:124b-11: / zhes bya ba la sogs pa dag go //
T07D4100-2:124b-12: lhas bskul nas 'od ma'i tshal na gnas pa'i bram
T07D4100-2:124b-13: ze dang khyim bdag dag gis ko ka li ka'i
T07D4100-2:124b-14: thad du lhags te smras pa /
T07D4100-2:124b-15: khyod la 'di ni rigs pa ma yin te /
T07D4100-2:124b-16: nyan thos chen po dag dang 'gal bar byed pas
T07D4100-2:124b-17: nged cag kyang dga' ba ma yin no zhes pa
T07D4100-2:124b-18: dang / de phrag dog gis sdig pa 'dod cing tshig mi snyan pas bya bar byed do //
T07D4100-2:124b-19: ji tsam na tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
T07D4100-2:124b-20: la khyod song la 'od ma'i tshal gyi lam srang
T07D4100-2:124b-21: dang bzhi mdo dag tu tshigs su bcad pa gnyis
T07D4100-2:124b-22: po 'di thon cig ces gsungs so //
T07D4100-2:124b-23: 'dod chags kyis kun nas bslang ba'i lus la sogs pa'i las ni snyigs ma ste /
T07D4100-2:124b-24: gnod par byed pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir dang /
T07D4100-2:124b-25: zil gyis gnon par byed pa'i mtshan mar gyur pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07D4100-2:124b-26: de gang la yod pa de ni snyigs ma yod bzhin du zhes bya ba yin te /
T07D4100-2:124b-28: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sogs pa'i sgras phyis pa
T07D4100-2:124b-29: yin te snyigs ma dang bcas pa ni nyes pa
T07D4100-2:124b-30: dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07D4100-2:124b-31: snyigs mas bslad pa'i phyir te gsum pa'o //
T07D4100-2:124b-32: ngur smrig gos zhes bya ba ni shing gi rtsa ba lta bu ste /
T07D4100-2:124b-33: nog po la sogs pa bskol ba las byung ba'i
T07D4100-2:124b-34: chon gyis bsgyur ba'i gos de ni gos tshon can
T07D4100-2:124b-35: te ngur smrig gi gos so //
T07D4100-2:124b-36: des 'gebs shing bkab pa ni gyon pa'o //
T07D4100-2:124b-37: dul dang des pa med pa zhes bya ba la dul ba ni dbang po sngom pa'o //
T07D4100-2:124b-38: des pa ni sems dul ba ste dge ba la mngon par dga' ba bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:125a-2: dul ba dang des pa dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni de'o //
T07D4100-2:125a-3: de nyid kyis ni drang srong chen po'i rgyal mtshan
T07D4100-2:125a-4: nam dur smrig gi gos yongs su bgo bar rigs
T07D4100-2:125a-6: gang zhig snyigs ma rnams spangs nas zhes bya ba
T07D4100-2:125a-7: ni gang yang snyigs ma yongs su spangs par gyur
T07D4100-2:125a-8: pa'o // tshul khrims la brten pa nyid kyis ni yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T07D4100-2:125a-9: tshul khrims legs par mnyam gzhag pa //
T07D4100-2:125a-11: so sor thar ba'i sdom pa la shin tu gus pas 'jug pa'o //
T07D4100-2:125a-12: yang na snyigs ma spangs pa nyid kyis ni tshul
T07D4100-2:125a-13: khrims la sogs pa spong ba ma yin no zhes
T07D4100-2:125a-14: bstan pa'i phyir / tshul khrims zhes bya ba smos so //
T07D4100-2:125a-15: dul dang nges par sngom pa zhes bya ba ni dbang po dang yid dam /
T07D4100-2:125a-16: de bzhin du bzod pa dang ldan pas so //
T07D4100-2:125a-17: de ni de nyid de sngar bstan pa'i skyon dang
T07D4100-2:125a-18: bral zhing yon tan dang ldan pa nyid kyis ni
T07D4100-2:125a-19: skye bo dge ba'i tshul du 'gyur gyi gzhan du
T07D4100-2:125a-21: g-yo sgyu 'jungs dang ldan ba'i mi //
T07D4100-2:125a-22: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T07D4100-2:125a-23: dge slong zhig mchog tu mdzes la kha dgo bzang
T07D4100-2:125a-24: zhing sha rgyas pa dang ldan pa thos pa mang
T07D4100-2:125a-26: g-yo sgyu che zhing ser sna dang ldan pa zhig
T07D4100-2:125a-27: rung ba dang gzhan 'dod pa chung ba las dgra
T07D4100-2:125a-28: bcom par gyur cing dgon pa la gnas pa ste

T07D4100-2:128b-8: de ni 'dod chags rnams kyis bcom //

T07D4100-2:181a-15: gyis skyon dang ldan pa dag la ni ma yin
T07D4100-2:181a-17: dge slong bsod snyoms zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T07D4100-2:181a-18: 'od srungs chen po la brgya byin gyis mchod pa
T07D4100-2:181a-19: byas so zhes dge slong rnams kyis thos nas dge
T07D4100-2:181a-20: slong lnga brgya tsam bsod snyoms byed par zhugs pa
T07D4100-2:181a-21: dang / de'i dbang du mdzad nas 'di gsungs so //
T07D4100-2:181a-22: bkur sti nor dang grags 'dod rnams la min //
T07D4100-2:181a-23: zhes bya ba la bkur sti ni mchod pa'o //
T07D4100-2:181a-25: nor ni don te de dag 'dod cing don du gnyer ba'i tshul 'di la yod pa'o //
T07D4100-2:181a-26: de la ni mi yang dga' bar mi byed na
T07D4100-2:181a-27: gzhan lta ci smos te lha spyin la sogs pa
T07D4100-2:181a-29: don dam pa'i dge slong gi gnas ni yang dag
T07D4100-2:181a-30: pa'i 'tsho bas yin gyi log pa'i 'tsho bas ni
T07D4100-2:181a-31: ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T07D4100-2:181a-32: dge slong 'dod pa kun spangs shing //
T07D4100-2:181a-33: zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
T07D4100-2:181a-34: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a ri'i bu nye du'i khyim du song ste /
T07D4100-2:181a-35: chos bstan pas phan 'dogs par byed do //
T07D4100-2:181a-36: bram ze ma rungs pa zhig gis de ma bzod de smras pa /
T07D4100-2:181a-37: bdag nyid bslus nas gzhan yang slu bar byed dam zhes byas pa dang /
T07D4100-2:181b-0: 'dod pa thams cad kyi yul du gyur @181b pa
T07D4100-2:181b-1: gang spangs pa ni 'dod pa kun spangs pa ste
T07D4100-2:181b-2: / rab tu byung ba yongs su bzung ba'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:181b-3: dge slong ni nang gi kun du 'khrugs pa bcom pa ste /
T07D4100-2:181b-4: sems rnam par dben pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:181b-5: dben par gyur na ni srid pa'i rtsa ba rtsa nas 'byin par nus te /
T07D4100-2:181b-6: srid pa'i rtsa ba phra rgyas drug ces pa'i tshig gis so //
T07D4100-2:181b-7: brtsal ba ni 'jig par byas pa ste yongs su spangs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:181b-8: gang zhe na mdun na gnas pa'i rdul zhes smos te /
T07D4100-2:181b-9: mdun na gnas pa ni rang gi rgyud la gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:181b-10: yang na 'jig rten thams cad kyi mngon par 'dod pa ste /
T07D4100-2:181b-11: de med na ni rjes su chags pa 'di la
T07D4100-2:181b-12: med cing gzi brjid kyang med do zhes 'phya bar
T07D4100-2:181b-14: 'dod chags la sogs pa ni rdul yin te /
T07D4100-2:181b-15: rdul 'dir 'dod chags yin gyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i mdo'i tshig gis so //
T07D4100-2:181b-16: rim pa gang gis rdul brtsal ba yin zhe na /
T07D4100-2:181b-17: bdag med ces bya ba dang gzhan la mi smra zhes bya ba ste /
T07D4100-2:181b-18: rnyed pa la sogs pa'i ched du kha gsag gis
T07D4100-2:181b-19: gzhan dga' bar byed pa ni smra pa ste gzhan
T07D4100-2:181b-20: gzud pa dang bslu ba'i ched du bya mi dgos
T07D4100-2:181b-21: pa yin te / gang nyon mongs pa dang bcas
T07D4100-2:181b-22: pa de ni rnyed pa la sogs pa'i ched du
T07D4100-2:181b-23: gzhan bslu ba la sogs pa dgos pa yin gyi
T07D4100-2:181b-24: nyon mongs pa med pa ni ma yin te /
T07D4100-2:181b-25: dri ma dang bcas pa'i gser ni me la sogs
T07D4100-2:181b-26: pas dag par mi 'gyur ba ma yin pa bzhin
T07D4100-2:181b-27: no // bag chags spangs pa ni rnam par 'gyur
T07D4100-2:181b-28: ba'i rgyu yod par gyur kyang rtogs pas mi 'gyur
T07D4100-2:181b-29: ba yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir skye bo ma
T07D4100-2:181b-30: bsdams zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T07D4100-2:181b-31: ri dags 'dzin gyi ma sa gas don 'di dag
T07D4100-2:181b-32: thos te des de la smras pa khyed cag bcom
T07D4100-2:181b-33: ldan 'das la de skad ma zer cig 'di lta
T07D4100-2:181b-34: bu'i tshul gyis bsngags pa ma yin pa khyed cag
T07D4100-2:181b-35: ma smra shig / yun ring bo'i gnod pa dang
T07D4100-2:181b-36: phan pa ma yin pa dang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur
T07D4100-2:181b-37: ro zhes ba nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
T07D4100-2:181b-39: btsun pa gzhan yang ma du ra ka'i rigs kyi
T07D4100-2:181b-40: lus kyi phyogs la bdag mi dga'o zhes pa dang
T07D4100-2:182a-1: kyis bsngags pa ma yin pa de gsan nas tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs so //
T07D4100-2:182a-2: des kyang zhag bdun bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi
T07D4100-2:182a-3: dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa spyan drangs
T07D4100-2:182a-4: so // gnod byed pa zhes bya pa ni gzhan
T07D4100-2:182a-5: la sgul bar byed pa dang 'chi bar byed pa'o
T07D4100-2:182a-6: so // // tshig gis ni ngag gis so //
T07D4100-2:182a-7: skye bo ma bsdams zhes bya ba ni tshul ngan
T07D4100-2:182a-8: pa ste ma dul ba'i rta srab dang bral ba
T07D4100-2:182a-9: bzhin no // gang la gnod par byed ce na
T07D4100-2:182a-10: yang dag par sdom pa la zhes bya ba'i tshig
T07D4100-2:182a-11: bzhin no // gi lhag ma'o // ji lta bu zhe na /
T07D4100-2:182a-12: g-yul ngor glang chen mda' yis bsnun pa bzhin //
T07D4100-2:182a-14: dper na glang po'i mchog sa srung la sogs pa
T07D4100-2:182a-15: mtshan phun sum tshogs pa yang lha dang lha ma
T07D4100-2:182a-16: yin gyi g-yul ngo'i sar lha ma yin gyis mda'
T07D4100-2:182a-17: la sogs pa'i mtshon gyis rgyun du 'bigs shing snun
T07D4100-2:182a-18: par byed pa bzhin du yon tan brgya stong phrag
T07D4100-2:182a-19: dpag tu med pas brgyan pa'i sems dpa' chen po
T07D4100-2:182a-20: yang skye bo dam pa ma yin pas rtsod pa'i
T07D4100-2:182a-21: dus su tshig rtsub po la sogs pa'i mda'i tshogs
T07D4100-2:182a-22: kyis gnod par byed de gang ma bsdams pa'i tshig
T07D4100-2:182a-24: des na de dag ji ltar byed pa yin zhe na /
T07D4100-2:182a-25: thos gyur kyang zhes bya ba ni rab tu thos gyur pa'o //
T07D4100-2:182a-26: tshig ces bya ba ni gnod par byed pa'o //
T07D4100-2:182a-28: mi bzad pa ni tshig rtsub po ste gnad la 'bebs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:182a-29: ji mi snyam zhes bya ba ni bzod pa'o //
T07D4100-2:182a-30: dge slong zhes bya ba ni gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis bsnyen par rdzogs pa ste /
T07D4100-2:182a-31: 'dod chags dang ma bral bar gyur kyang dge spyod byed pa la rjes su 'jug pa'o //
T07D4100-2:182a-32: de yang phyi rol la ji mi snyam pa ni
T07D4100-2:182a-33: ma yin gyi dge sbyong byed pa la gnas shing
T07D4100-2:182a-34: 'on kyang nang la bzod pa tsam ni yin te
T07D4100-2:182a-35: de yang mi 'khrugs pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T07D4100-2:182a-36: de nyid kyang sdang sems bral la zhes bya ba 'di smos te /
T07D4100-2:182a-38: yang dag par yongs su brtags pas 'di nyid kyis
T07D4100-2:182a-39: bzod par nus kyi gzhan gyis ni ma yin no
T07D4100-2:182a-41: skye bo ma bsdams zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T07D4100-2:182a-42: legs gzhag la zhes bya ba ni shes rab sngon
T07D4100-2:182a-43: du 'gro zhing snying rje gzung ba byas la nges
T07D4100-2:182b-1: gang zhe na yid ces bya ba ni sems te
T07D4100-2:182b-2: yang dag pa nyid du gzhag pa'i rnam par shes
T07D4100-2:182b-3: pa'o // gang legs par gzhag pa'i yid de gang yin zhe na /
T07D4100-2:182b-4: bzo yis mi 'tsho zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:182b-5: dge slong dag dkyil 'khor bzhin du gnas shing 'khod
T07D4100-2:182b-6: nas gtam rjod par byed de btsun pa dag bzo'i
T07D4100-2:182b-7: gnas ni legs par gzhag pa yin no zhes pa
T07D4100-2:182b-8: nas ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das gshegs te 'di
T07D4100-2:182b-9: gsungs so // bzo ni dbyig dang gser la sogs pa yang brdung ba dang /
T07D4100-2:182b-10: yi ge la sogs pa mkhas par byas pa des 'tsho ba'i ngang tshul 'di la yod pa ste /
T07D4100-2:182b-11: de las gzhan pa'i bzo byas kyang mi 'tsho ba'o //
T07D4100-2:182b-12: ji ltar na dge slong de ni bzo la brten
T07D4100-2:182b-13: nas 'tsho ba gnas par byed pa ma yin te
T07D4100-2:182b-14: / tshul 'di ni khyim pa'i skye bo yin no zhes byas nas so //
T07D4100-2:182b-15: spang ba ni yo byad bsnyungs pa bstan te yo byad mang po mi bya ba dang /
T07D4100-2:182b-16: 'tshog chas mang po ma yin pa dang /
T07D4100-2:182b-17: legs par bkod pa'i tshul dang /
T07D4100-2:182b-18: ma smin pa'i 'bru len pa spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:182b-19: bdag la dga' zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid la
T07D4100-2:182b-20: 'dod par byed cing bdag la dga' ba gang yin
T07D4100-2:182b-21: pa des ni legs par spyod pa la rtag tu
T07D4100-2:182b-23: ji ltar yang dge slong bdag la dga' ba yin zhe na /
T07D4100-2:182b-24: 'di ni gcig tu dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang /
T07D4100-2:182b-25: dge sbyong la dga' ba dang /
T07D4100-2:182b-26: bslab pa 'dod pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:182b-27: 'dis dge ba'i chos la 'dun pa bstan nas dbang po'i sdom pa smras pa /
T07D4100-2:182b-28: dbang po dul ba zhes smos te /
T07D4100-2:182b-29: dbang po dul ba'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:182b-30: 'dis ni tshul khrims kyi sdom pa bstan to //
T07D4100-2:182b-31: kun las rnam grol zhing zhes bya ba ni sdig pa'i yan lag thams cad dang /
T07D4100-2:182b-32: sdig pa'i rgyu thams cad las te sdig pa las ldog pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:182b-33: de ltar khyim pas ni byed par mi nus kyi rab tu byung bas nus pa'i phyir bshad pa /
T07D4100-2:182b-34: khyim la ma chags zhes bya ba ste khyim snying
T07D4100-2:182b-35: por byed pa gang yin pa de ni khyim snying
T07D4100-2:182b-36: por byed pa ste khyim len cing chags pa gang
T07D4100-2:182b-37: yin pa'o // de las gzhan pa ni rab tu byung ba zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07D4100-2:182b-38: de nas tshul khrims la brten nas lam bsgom pa'i khyad par smras pa /
T07D4100-2:183a-1: med ces bya ba ste 'jig tshogs la lta ba med pa'i phyir mthong pa'i lam bstan to //
T07D4100-2:183a-2: sred pa spangs pa zhes bya pa ni sred pa spangs pa'i phyir bsgom pa'i lam bstan to //
T07D4100-2:183a-3: gang gi tshe lam gnyis kyis dang po spang bar
T07D4100-2:183a-4: bya ba yongs su shes pa de'i tshe bshad pa
T07D4100-2:183a-5: 'dod spangs zhes bya ba ste dang po 'dod pa'i
T07D4100-2:183a-6: khams spangs pa'o // gcig tu spyod pa ni mnyam
T07D4100-2:183a-7: par gzhag pa'i sa pa'i nyon mongs pas dben pa'i
T07D4100-2:183a-8: khams spangs pa'o // phyir te / de nyid don dam pa'i dge slong yin no //
T07D4100-2:183a-9: dge slong de nyid ni sdug bsngal zad pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes bstan to //
T07D4100-2:183a-10: 'tsho gtsang zhes zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T07D4100-2:183a-11: kun du rgyu nag po rgyun shes zhes bya bas
T07D4100-2:183a-12: bcom ldan 'das la btsun pa ci tsam gyis na
T07D4100-2:183a-13: dge slong sdug bsngal zad pa 'thob par 'gyur zhes
T07D4100-2:183a-15: grogs po mthun pa bsten bya zhing //
T07D4100-2:183a-16: zhes bya ba la mnyam pa 'am khyad par du
T07D4100-2:183a-17: gyur pa'i dge ba'i grogs po phan 'dogs par byed
T07D4100-2:183a-18: pa ni bsten par bya ste /
T07D4100-2:183a-19: gang la brten nas sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams 'grib pa dang /
T07D4100-2:183a-20: dge ba'i chos rnams 'phel ba de ni mthun pa'i grogs po'o //
T07D4100-2:183a-21: 'tsho gtsang zhes bya ba ni yongs su dag pa'i
T07D4100-2:183a-22: kun du 'tsho pa'i yo byad gang yin pa ste
T07D4100-2:183a-23: log pa'i 'tsho ba spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:183a-24: bslab ba bsrung ba'i rim pa bstan pa /
T07D4100-2:183a-25: snyom las med pa zhes bya ba ste yongs su gzung ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:183a-26: gang gi phyir yongs su gzung ba yod pa ni
T07D4100-2:183a-27: snyom las skye bar 'gyur te gang dag myu gu
T07D4100-2:183a-28: mang por 'phros pa'i shing bzhin no //
T07D4100-2:183a-29: de bkag pas ni snyom las med pa ste /
T07D4100-2:183a-31: gzung bya mi 'dzin dge slong dang //
T07D4100-2:183a-32: thibs po'i nang du g-yag gnas dang //
T07D4100-2:183a-33: dgon du ma he gnas pa ste /
T07D4100-2:183a-36: yongs su gzung ba med kyang de ci nus par gzhan la phan par byed de /
T07D4100-2:183a-37: 'di ltar so sor bgo bsha' bya ba dang zhes
T07D4100-2:183a-38: bya ba so sor bgo bsha'i sgo nas kyang de
T07D4100-2:183a-39: ltar khyad par du phan 'dogs pa de la 'jug
T07D4100-2:183a-40: cing 'di ltar rab tu 'jug par byed pa'o //
T07D4100-2:183a-41: bgo bsha' yang rnam pa gnyis te chos kyis so sor bgo bsha' bya ba dang /
T07D4100-2:183b-0: zang zing @183b gis so sor bgo bsha' bya ba'o zhes pa'i tshig gis so //
T07D4100-2:183b-1: skyes bu dam pa la brten pas 'tsho ba kun du dag pa dang /
T07D4100-2:183b-2: yongs su gzung ba med cing gtong bar gyur na
T07D4100-2:183b-3: ni rnam pa thams cad du gzhan la phan 'dogs
T07D4100-2:183b-5: bdag nyid dam pa'i tshul mchog tu byed pas gzhan
T07D4100-2:183b-6: la phan 'dogs par nus kyi gzhan du ni ma
T07D4100-2:183b-7: yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T07D4100-2:183b-8: spyod yul cho ga mkhas par bya //
T07D4100-2:183b-10: bslab pa dang nye ba'i bslab pa bsrung ba la mkhas par 'gyur bas so //
T07D4100-2:183b-11: ci'i phyir spyod yul gyi cho ga mkhas pa la sbyor ba yin zhe na /
T07D4100-2:183b-12: 'di ltar spyod yul cho ga mkhas pa yis //
T07D4100-2:183b-14: dam pa'i spyod pa la dga' bas 'dul ba bzhin
T07D4100-2:183b-15: du sde snod gsum du bstan pa'i cho ga dang
T07D4100-2:183b-16: rjes su mthun pas tshul khrims yongs su shes pa
T07D4100-2:183b-17: la rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:183b-18: de lta bu'i dge slong des 'bras bu ji zhig 'thob pa yin zhe na /
T07D4100-2:183b-19: sdug bsngal zad pa zhes bya ba 'khor ba las thar pa 'thob par byed pa'o //
T07D4100-2:183b-20: ji ltar yang dge slong spyod yul gyi cho ga la mkhas pa yin zhe na /
T07D4100-2:183b-21: bstan pa'i phyir rkang pa legs bsdams zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T07D4100-2:183b-22: dge slong zhig bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa las
T07D4100-2:183b-23: legs par ma bsdams shing spyod yul du shin tu
T07D4100-2:183b-24: ma bsdams pa zhig ste ji tsam na rab tu
T07D4100-2:183b-25: dben pa'i nags su song nas shing zhig gi drung
T07D4100-2:183b-26: du 'dug ste ting nge 'dzin sgom par byed do
T07D4100-2:183b-27: // bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi tshogs dang bcas
T07D4100-2:183b-28: te nags su rgyu zhing gshegs pa dang de las
T07D4100-2:183b-29: // brtsams so // gzhan dag ni rgyal byed kyi tshal du chu skyar gyi sgra cig grag ste /
T07D4100-2:183b-30: steng du bltas pa dang so phag gcig lhung ste
T07D4100-2:183b-31: song bas ngang pa zhig gsad pa'i dge slong las
T07D4100-2:183b-33: lag pa gnyis legs par bsdams pa ni lag pa legs par bsdams pa ste /
T07D4100-2:183b-34: lag pa yang dag par sdom zhing brtse bas rdeg par byed pa dang /
T07D4100-2:183b-35: gzhan gyi nor len pa la sogs pa de'i sgrub pa mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:183b-36: rkang pa legs bdams zhes bya ba ni de dang
T07D4100-2:183b-37: 'brel pa'i srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i don te
T07D4100-2:183b-38: / 'gro ba na 'chi ba la sogs pa mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:183b-39: lus kyi sdom pa bstan nas ngag gi sdom pa smras pa /
T07D4100-2:183b-40: tshig rnams legs bsdams zhes bya ba ngag gi nyes par spyod pa bzhi spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:183b-41: dbang po'i sdom pa bstan pa /
T07D4100-2:184a-0: dbang po legs bsdams zhes bya ba ste @184a * //
T07D4100-2:184a-1: dbang po'i dul ba'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:184a-2: nang du dga' ba zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid la lhag pa ni nang ngo //
T07D4100-2:184a-3: de la dga' ba ni yul dag las sems rab
T07D4100-2:184a-4: tu bsdus pa ste 'dis tshogs kyi lam bstan nas
T07D4100-2:184a-6: mnyam par 'jog ces bya ba ni zag pa med
T07D4100-2:184a-7: pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par dang ldan pa'i
T07D4100-2:184a-8: phyir ro // gcig tu zhes bya ba ni rang dbang zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07D4100-2:184a-9: yang na las dang nyon mongs pa'i grogs med pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:184a-10: chog shes zhes bya ba ni yang dag par dga'
T07D4100-2:184a-11: ba skye ba ste mthong ba'i chos bde bar gnas
T07D4100-2:184a-12: pas so // de ni dge slong yin zhes gsungs //
T07D4100-2:184a-13: zhes bya ba ni de nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis don dam pa'i dge slong du bstan te /
T07D4100-2:184a-14: gzhan ni ming tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:184a-15: rgyu gang gis cho ga 'di lta bu la dmigs pa yin zhe na /
T07D4100-2:184a-16: dge slong chos la kun dga' zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T07D4100-2:184a-17: dge slong gzhan zhig rtag tu chos nyan cing sems pa dang sgom par byed la /
T07D4100-2:184a-18: de nyid la mngon par dga' bas ji tsam na dgra bcom par gyur te /
T07D4100-2:184a-20: gzhan dag ni rgyal byed kyi tshal na chos kyi
T07D4100-2:184a-21: kun dga' ra ba zhes bya ba'i gnas brtan gyi
T07D4100-2:184a-22: dbang du mdzad do zhes zer ro //

T07D4100-2:196a-25: gang du bdag la sogs par lta ba de ni

T07D4100-2:196a-28: rtag tu byed gang rnal 'byor de //

T07D4100-2:196a-31: pa'i phyir ro // mya ngan las 'das gang bde

T07D4100-2:196a-33: zhi ba thob pa de ni don dam pa'i bde

T07D4100-2:196a-37: po nyams su myong ba yin na g-yeng ba'i dngos
T07D4100-2:196a-38: po thams cad dang bral bar gyur pa lta smos
T07D4100-2:196a-39: pa'i phyir ro // // kyang ci dgos // dge
T07D4100-2:196a-40: slong gi rang gi ngo bo sgo mang po nas
T07D4100-2:196a-41: bstan nas da ni de'i yon tan bsags pa la
T07D4100-2:196a-42: pa'i phyir ro // // kyang ci dgos // gzud
T07D4100-2:196a-43: pa'i phyir / dge slong dga' dang mi dags zhes
T07D4100-2:196a-44: bya ba la sogs pa yin te /
T07D4100-2:196a-45: dge slong dag 'di na gcig tu phung po la
T07D4100-2:196b-0: gnod @196b pa chung ngu dang mang po yang rung
T07D4100-2:196b-2: de bzhin du nye du'i tshogs spangs te /

T07D4100-2:196b-5: pa des bzod cing gnas pa'i rang bzhin can te
T07D4100-2:196b-6: grang ba dang dro ba la yang ngo zhes pa

T07D4100-2:196b-9: 'dir ni de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i khong khro ba la dgongs so //
T07D4100-2:196b-10: dga' ba ni yid bde ba ste /
T07D4100-2:196b-11: 'dir ni de dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i 'dod chags so //
T07D4100-2:196b-12: mi dga' ba dang dga' ba yin pas dga' mi dga'o //
T07D4100-2:196b-13: mi 'byed pa ni bstsal pa dang /
T07D4100-2:196b-14: zil gyis gnon pa nyid de khong khro ba dang
T07D4100-2:196b-15: rjes su chags pa bstsal ba'i phyir 'dis ni bzod
T07D4100-2:196b-17: bzod pa dka' thub dam pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //
T07D4100-2:196b-18: dben pa'i mthus ni bzod pa la 'jug par nus so zhes bstan te /
T07D4100-2:196b-19: bas mtha'i gnas mal rtag tu bsten pa dang //
T07D4100-2:196b-20: zhes bya bar ni shin tu dben pa'i phyogs su gnas shing bsten pa ste /
T07D4100-2:196b-21: 'dis ni lus dben pa bstan te /
T07D4100-2:196b-23: de yang bag yod pas ni rtag tu gnas //
T07D4100-2:196b-25: bas mtha'i gnas mal der mi gtsang ba yid la
T07D4100-2:196b-26: byed cing bsgom pa mchog tu byed pas gnas pa'o
