T07D4100-2:196b-28: srid pa'i 'dod chags legs par 'byin par byed //
T07D4100-2:196b-30: srid pa gsum 'grub par byed pa 'dod pa'i 'dod
T07D4100-2:196b-31: chags la sogs pa'i phra rgyas mi skye bar gnyen
T07D4100-2:196b-32: pos rtsa nas 'byin par byed cing de na gnas
T07D4100-2:196b-33: pa'o // srid pa'i 'dod chags spangs pa'i phra rgyas bsdu ba bya ste /
T07D4100-2:196b-35: yang na tshigs bcad 'dis ni 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi bstan te /
T07D4100-2:196b-36: dge slong dga' dang mi dags zhes bya ba la
T07D4100-2:196b-37: sogs pas ni chos gos dang bsod snyoms ngan ngon
T07D4100-2:196b-38: tsam gyis cho ga shes pa bstan to //
T07D4100-2:196b-39: bas mtha'i gnas mal zhes bya ba la sogs pas
T07D4100-2:196b-40: ni gnas mal ngan ngon tsam gyis chog shes pa
T07D4100-2:196b-41: bstan to // lhag mas ni spong ba la dga' ba bstan to //
T07D4100-2:196b-42: dge slong gi choms te sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'i rnam par 'grel pa rdzogs so /
T07D4100-2:197a-1: tshoms gzhan med pas bram ze'i tshoms dgod do //
T07D4100-2:197a-2: yang na don dam pa'i dge slong ni bram ze
T07D4100-2:197a-3: kho na yin no zhes bstan phyir 'di'i 'og tu
T07D4100-2:197a-5: gang zhig brgyan kyang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T07D4100-2:197a-6: gang gi tshe rigs mthon po'i bu ya sha zhes
T07D4100-2:197a-7: bya ba btsun mo'i 'khor la mtshan mo dur khrod
T07D4100-2:197a-8: kyi 'du shes skyes te bdag ni mngon par gtses
T07D4100-2:197a-9: so zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras nas khyim
T07D4100-2:197a-10: nas byung ste / ko mi tra zhes bya ba'i chu bo'i tshul rol gyi 'gram nas rgal te /
T07D4100-2:197a-11: bcom ldan 'das la chos mnyan pas dgra bcom pa'i
T07D4100-2:197a-12: 'bras bu thob pa las bdag nyid khyim pa'i cha
T07D4100-2:197a-13: lugs kyi spud pa mthong nas ngo tsha bar gyur
T07D4100-2:197a-15: gang zhig ni gang la la rigs dang rus la
T07D4100-2:197a-16: sogs pa la ltos pa med par khyad par thob
T07D4100-2:197a-17: pa'o // brgyan pa ni rgyan dang ldan pa ste
T07D4100-2:197a-18: khyim pa'i cha lugs sna tshogs spud pa dang 'brel
T07D4100-2:197a-19: pa'o // ba'o // yang gi sgra ni srid pa'i don te /
T07D4100-2:197a-20: de lta na yang dam pa'i chos spyod pa srid pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:197a-21: chos spyod ces bya ba ni dge ba byed pa'o //
T07D4100-2:197a-22: ji lta bu'i sems can gyis ji ltar byas nas chos spyod par nus pa yin zhe na /
T07D4100-2:197a-23: dul ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T07D4100-2:197a-24: dbang po dul ba dang ldan pa ni dul ba'o //
T07D4100-2:197a-25: zhi ba ni rnam par rtog pa 'bar ba nye bar zhi ba'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:197a-26: yang dag par sdom pa ni tshul khrims khyad par can dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:197a-27: tshangs par spyod pa ni ye shes la brten pa'i
T07D4100-2:197a-28: phyir te ye shes spyad pas ni tshangs pa ste
T07D4100-2:197a-29: / thar pa thob pa yin no zhes byas nas so //
T07D4100-2:197a-30: de la snga ma gsum gyis ni bsod nams kyi tshogs bstan to //
T07D4100-2:197a-31: 'dis ni ye shes kyi tshogs bstan to //
T07D4100-2:197a-32: de ltar gyur pas ni chos spyod pa rdzogs par 'gyur gyis gzhan du ni ma yin no //
T07D4100-2:197a-33: 'byung po kun la zhes bya ba ni dgra dang
T07D4100-2:197a-34: mdza' bo dang bar ma'i phyogs med par sems can
T07D4100-2:197a-35: de dag la'o // yang na srog dang bcas pa'am srog med pa'i sems can la'o //
T07D4100-2:197a-36: mi gcod pa ni spangs pa'am bor ba'o //
T07D4100-2:197a-37: chad pa ni 'tshe ba dang de'i cha byad do //
T07D4100-2:197a-38: gzhan la 'tshe ba spangs pa sngon du 'gro bas
T07D4100-2:197a-39: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs nye bar len
T07D4100-2:197a-41: yang na zhi ba dang ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang
T07D4100-2:197b-0: du byas pa'i phyir de @197b dang rjes su mthun
T07D4100-2:197b-1: pa zhes 'di'i don gyis bshad do //
T07D4100-2:197b-2: yang na 'tshe ba med pa'i gnas tshol bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin te /
T07D4100-2:197b-4: chos 'dis bskyed par byas te thar pa 'dod pa
T07D4100-2:197b-5: de ni legs pa thams cad kyi rtsa bar gyur
T07D4100-2:197b-6: pa yin gyi gzhan ni ma yin no zhe'o //
T07D4100-2:197b-7: dul ba la sogs pa'i rim pas ni dbang po
T07D4100-2:197b-8: dang tshul khrims dang yid yang dag par sdom pa
T07D4100-2:197b-10: tshang par spyod pa ni lam gyi sbyor ba ste
T07D4100-2:197b-11: kun la zhes bya ba la sogs pas khyim pa'i
T07D4100-2:197b-12: cha lugs spangs nas gzhan la gnod pa byed pa
T07D4100-2:197b-13: mtha' dag spangs pa des nye bar mtshon pa'i phyir
T07D4100-2:197b-14: ro ; / yang na chos 'di nyid ni dge ba'i chos spyod pa la brjod do //
T07D4100-2:197b-15: de yang bdag gi yon tan skyed pa dang gzhan
T07D4100-2:197b-16: gyi yon tan skyed pa rab tu 'god par byed
T07D4100-2:197b-17: pa'o // de la dul ba la sogs pa'i bdag
T07D4100-2:197b-18: gi yon tan bskyed pa rnam pa bzhi bsgom pa
T07D4100-2:197b-19: rtogs nas 'dod pa bsgom pa la brten te dbang
T07D4100-2:197b-20: po'i sgo bsrungs pas zhi ba ste /
T07D4100-2:197b-21: tshul khrims bsgom pa kha na ma tho ba med
T07D4100-2:197b-22: pas lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyis zhi
T07D4100-2:197b-23: ba dang / sems bsgom zhing nyon mongs pa kun du rgyu ba bkag pas kun du sdom pa'o //
T07D4100-2:197b-24: shes rab bsgom pa kun du rtogs par byas nas 'phags pa'i lam la sbyor ba'o //
T07D4100-2:197b-25: tshangs pa spyod pas ni gzhan gyi yon tan skyed pa'o //
T07D4100-2:197b-26: 'byung ba kun las zhes bya bas ni 'dis bstan pa de yang //
T07D4100-2:197b-27: 'dod pa la sogs pa rnam pa bzhi bsgom pa
T07D4100-2:197b-28: med pas yongs su 'tshe ba med pa'i phyir ro
T07D4100-2:197b-29: // bram ze de yin zhes bya ba ni sdig pa spangs pa'i phyir te /
T07D4100-2:197b-31: yon tan sogs par byed pa dang //
T07D4100-2:197b-32: 'dod pas yid ni mi nyams pa //
T07D4100-2:197b-33: bram ze la ni mchog tu byed //
T07D4100-2:197b-34: lam gnas pa ni bram zer 'dod //
T07D4100-2:197b-36: dge sbyong de yin zhes bya ba ni sdig pa zhi ba'am dge sbyong dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:197b-37: dge slong de zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa
T07D4100-2:197b-38: bcom pa'i phyir ram so sor thar pa'i sdom pa
T07D4100-2:197b-40: yon tan gyis byas pa ni bram ze la sogs
T07D4100-2:197b-41: pa yin gyi rigs la sogs pa rtags kyis byas
T07D4100-2:197b-42: pa ni ma yin no zhes bstan te /
T07D4100-2:197b-43: tshig rkang gsum gyis go rims bzhin du bram ze la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid bstan to //
T07D4100-2:198a-0: 'o na gcer bur spyod pa la sogs pa yang bram ze la sogs par @198a * //
T07D4100-2:198a-1: 'jig rten du grags pa yin no zhe na de dgag pa'i phyir smras pa /
T07D4100-2:198a-2: gcer bur spyod pas ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T07D4100-2:198a-3: ri gangs can gyi dka' thub kyi gnas dben pa
T07D4100-2:198a-4: zhi ga na dka' thub spyod pa la mngon par
T07D4100-2:198a-5: brtson pa'i dka' thub can mang po gnas te /
T07D4100-2:198a-6: kha cig ni gcer bu pa'o //
T07D4100-2:198a-7: kha cig ni sgra'i ral pa can no //
T07D4100-2:198a-9: ci tsam na de dag gis lha rnams nam mkha'
T07D4100-2:198a-10: la spyod pa dag la sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i gtam
T07D4100-2:198a-11: thos nas yid yongs su dga' bar gyur te yul
T07D4100-2:198a-12: b'a r'a na s'ir bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du
T07D4100-2:198a-13: song ba las de las brtsams te tshigs su bcad
T07D4100-2:198a-15: gcer bu spyod pa zhes bya ba ni sdig pa sbyong bar byed ces bya ba dang sbyar ro //
T07D4100-2:198a-16: gcer bur spyod pa ni gos med par spyod pa ste /
T07D4100-2:198a-17: lus kyi sgrib pa dang bral bar byas pas sems
T07D4100-2:198a-18: kyi sgrib pa dang bral bar byed do zhes mu
T07D4100-2:198a-19: stegs kyi gzhung ston par byed pas /
T07D4100-2:198a-20: kha cig gcer bu dmigs par byed do //
T07D4100-2:198a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis ni 'di bkag ste /
T07D4100-2:198a-22: ngo tsha med pa zhes smad pa'i phyir te gang
T07D4100-2:198a-23: lus la sgrib cing g-yogs pa'i gos med pa de
T07D4100-2:198a-24: la ni sems la yang ngo tsha'i gos med pa
T07D4100-2:198a-25: yin te ngo tsha med pa ni phyugs dang 'dra
T07D4100-2:198a-26: ba'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:198a-27: ral pas ma yin zhes bya ba ni ral pa'i skra'i tshogs kyis ma yin te /
T07D4100-2:198a-28: skra yang rkang pa'i bar du nar zhing sbrul lta bur ring por 'jog par byed do //
T07D4100-2:198a-29: skra rab tu bsgrubs pas ni nad 'byung ste //
T07D4100-2:198a-30: de bsrings pas ni 'dod chags dang bral bar zhugs pa dang /
T07D4100-2:198a-31: rtogs par byed pa ma yin no zhes bstan to //
T07D4100-2:198a-32: bregs pas ma yin pa ni skra dang kha spu
T07D4100-2:198a-33: bregs pa'am skra dang kha spu 'bal bas kyang ma
T07D4100-2:198a-34: yin te / phyi rol gyi thibs po bstsal bar
T07D4100-2:198a-35: gyur na yang nang gi 'dod chags la sogs pa'i
T07D4100-2:198a-36: thibs po dang bral ba ma yin te /
T07D4100-2:198a-37: 'gal bas de dang bral ba'i phyir 'di'o //
T07D4100-2:198a-38: kha zas mi za ba yis ma yin zhes bya
T07D4100-2:198a-39: ba ni kha zas rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su
T07D4100-2:198a-40: longs spyod par mi byed pas ma yin te /
T07D4100-2:198a-41: dper na bza' ba dang btung ba yongs su longs
T07D4100-2:198a-42: spyod pas bkres pa dang skom pa sel bar byed
T07D4100-2:198a-44: phra rgyas sel bar byed pa yang bzlog pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:198b-0: yang na cung zad ni zas te @198b cung zad kha zas te cung zad ser skya bzhin no //
T07D4100-2:198b-1: de med pas ni kha zas mi za bas te
T07D4100-2:198b-2: bza' ba dang btung ba cung zad kyang yongs su
T07D4100-2:198b-3: longs mi spyod pa ste gang grib ma dang nyi
T07D4100-2:198b-4: ma la sogs pas rjes su 'dzin par byed pa
T07D4100-2:198b-5: de yang mi spyod na gzhan lta smos kyang ci
T07D4100-2:198b-6: dgos / thang la nyal ba'am zhes bya ba ni
T07D4100-2:198b-7: yid dam sngon du 'gro bas mthong ba'i thang skam
T07D4100-2:198b-9: yang na stan med pa'i sa skam po'i steng du nyal ba'o //
T07D4100-2:198b-10: 'am zhes bya ba ni ma yin par drang ba'i don to //
T07D4100-2:198b-11: mal stan ngan pa la gnas pa ni phra rgyas 'phel bar mi 'gyur ro zhes byas nas so //
T07D4100-2:198b-12: rdul dang dri mas ma yin zhes bya ba la rdul ni thal ba'i phye ma'o //
T07D4100-2:198b-13: dri ma ni rdul la sogs pa dang 'brel pa'i lus kyi 'dam mo //
T07D4100-2:198b-14: dri ma yang rnam pa gnyis te dri ma de
T07D4100-2:198b-15: zhi ba ni lus kyi dri ma sems kyis 'dren
T07D4100-2:198b-16: pa'o // lus kyi dri ma 'dren pa yang srang gi mtho dman bzhin du'o //
T07D4100-2:198b-18: zhes bya ba ni tsog tsog por 'dug pa gang yin pa de ni tsog bur 'dug pa ste //
T07D4100-2:198b-19: tsog pu la mchog tu gnas pa'o //
T07D4100-2:198b-20: ji ltar bdag gis sa la 'dug par byed pa
T07D4100-2:198b-21: de bzhin du dam pa'i rgyud la 'dod chags la
T07D4100-2:198b-22: sogs pa yang de lta'o zhes rtogs pas so //
T07D4100-2:198b-23: yang na 'bad pa ni brtson 'grus te tsog pur 'dug pa'i gnas skabs de la sran thub pa'o //
T07D4100-2:198b-24: dag par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gcer
T07D4100-2:198b-25: bur spyod pa la sogs pas dag par mi 'gyur
T07D4100-2:198b-26: zhing sdig pa la sogs pa'i dri ma gang gis
T07D4100-2:198b-28: gang dag par mi 'gyur ba yin zhe na /
T07D4100-2:198b-29: byis pa zhes bya ba smos te so so'i skye bo'o //
T07D4100-2:198b-31: som nyi rnams las rgal mi 'gyur //
T07D4100-2:198b-33: mthong ba'i lam ma skyes pa'i phyir som nyi ma spangs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:198b-34: de bas na som nyi ma spangs pa nyid kyis
T07D4100-2:198b-35: so so'i skye bo 'phags pa'i chos ma thob pa
T07D4100-2:198b-36: zhes ston to // de ltar 'di lta bus de
T07D4100-2:198b-37: kho na nyid kyi shes pa med pa'i nyes dmigs
T07D4100-2:198b-38: smras pa de dag nyid la zhes bya ba la
T07D4100-2:198b-40: bstan ma thag pa'i gcer bus spyod pa la sogs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:198b-41: nyid kyi sgra ni bdag med pa mthong ba la sogs pa yongs su spangs pa'i don to //
T07D4100-2:198b-42: chags byed pa zhes bya ba ni zhen par byed
T07D4100-2:198b-43: cing 'di nyid ni sdig pa dag par byed pa
T07D4100-2:199a-1: pas mngon par zhen pa'i don to //
T07D4100-2:199a-2: gang yang rung zhes bya ba ni kha cig ste /
T07D4100-2:199a-3: gang zhig 'di ltar yang dag pa'i mthong ba med pas so //
T07D4100-2:199a-4: dge sbyong dang bram ze zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob dang don dam pa dang /
T07D4100-2:199a-5: mthun par yongs su bzung ba spangs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:199a-6: dam pa'i spyod pa ni dge sbyong ngo//
T07D4100-2:199a-7: yongs su bzung ba dang bcas pa ni bram ze'o zhes gzhan dag zer ro //
T07D4100-2:199a-8: log pa la mngon par zhen pa'i 'bras bu smras ba /
T07D4100-2:199a-9: bar ma dor ni zhes bya ba ste /
T07D4100-2:199a-11: nye bar zhes bya ba ni tshig gi lhag ma'o //
T07D4100-2:199a-12: ri'i sgra ni 'khor ba'i bar ma do nyid du'o zhes pa'o //
T07D4100-2:199a-13: rnam par nyams pa zhes bya ba ni khyad par
T07D4100-2:199a-14: du nyams shing chags par byed pas ltung ba zhes
T07D4100-2:199a-16: gang du ji ltar zhe na /
T07D4100-2:199a-17: zag pa zad pa ma thob par //
T07D4100-2:199a-20: gcer bur spyod pa la sogs pa'i brtul zhugs dang
T07D4100-2:199a-21: ldan pa ni rdzogs byed mnar med par skyes par
T07D4100-2:199a-23: zag pa zad pas ni tshor ba spangs par 'gyur la /
T07D4100-2:199a-24: tshor ba 'gags pas ni sred pa 'gag go zhes
T07D4100-2:199a-25: pa'i tshig gis tshor ba zad pa zhes smos so
T07D4100-2:199a-26: // srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral
T07D4100-2:199a-27: ba nyid de srid pa'i rgyu tshor ba spangs pa
T07D4100-2:199a-28: ni lta ba spangs pa sngon du 'gro bas tshor
T07D4100-2:199a-29: ba thams cad spangs pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i
T07D4100-2:199a-30: // phyir / mtha' gcig la lta ba zhes bya ba smos so //
T07D4100-2:199a-31: sdig pa dag par 'dod pas nye bar longs spyod cing mngon par zhen to //
T07D4100-2:199a-32: de yang lam gyis ni ma yin gyi log pa
T07D4100-2:199a-33: la mngon par zhen pa ni mi shes pa yin
T07D4100-2:199a-35: blo ngan rnams zhes bya ba ni srid pas srid
T07D4100-2:199a-36: pa las nges par 'byung bar rtog pa'i blo ngan
T07D4100-2:199a-37: pa gang dag la yod pa'o //
T07D4100-2:199a-38: zag pa ma spangs na ni khyad bar las nyams par bstan te /
T07D4100-2:199a-39: go 'phang dam pa ma thob par //
T07D4100-2:199a-40: zhes bya ba mya ngan las 'das pa ma thob par ro //
T07D4100-2:199a-41: zag pa zad pa la sogs pa ma byas par
T07D4100-2:199a-42: ni ral pa la sogs pas dgos pa med do
T07D4100-2:199a-44: blo ngan khyod kyi ral pa ci //
T07D4100-2:199a-45: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T07D4100-2:199a-46: khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas chu bo bal gu ma
T07D4100-2:199a-47: ti'i 'gram na gnas pa'i bram ze gzhon nu zhig
T07D4100-2:199a-48: gis skra la ba lta bur blta ba ste ras
T07D4100-2:199a-49: kyis dkris nas skye bo slu bar byed do //
T07D4100-2:199b-0: @199b de gdul ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das phyogs der
T07D4100-2:199b-1: gshegs te des mthong nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thad
T07D4100-2:199b-2: du lhags te de las brtsams so //
T07D4100-2:199b-3: khyod ci zhes bya ba ni khyod kyi skra'i tshogs
T07D4100-2:199b-4: kyi gzugs te sbrul ltar ring ba'i ral pa ni
T07D4100-2:199b-5: dgos pa ci zhig yod de /
T07D4100-2:199b-6: des byas pa'i phan btags pa ma mthong ba'i phyir dang /
T07D4100-2:199b-7: nye bar gdung bar byed pa thob par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:199b-8: blo ngan zhes bya ba ni blo phyin ci log pa ste /
T07D4100-2:199b-9: mi shes pas 'di byas so zhes ston pa yin no //
T07D4100-2:199b-10: khyod kyi g-yang gzhi gyon pa ci //
T07D4100-2:199b-11: zhes bya ba ni ri dags kyi bdags pa las
T07D4100-2:199b-12: byas pa'i gos kyis khyod la ci zhig dgos pa
T07D4100-2:199b-13: ste dgos pa med pas so //
T07D4100-2:199b-14: 'dis ni phyi rol mdzes la khyod kyi nang ni shin tu ma rungs pa'o zhes bstan te /
T07D4100-2:199b-15: khyod nang thibs por 'dug bzhin du //
T07D4100-2:199b-16: zhes bya ba khyod kyi sems shin tu dri ma can du gnas te /
T07D4100-2:199b-17: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pas nye bar gos pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:199b-18: phyi rol legs par byi dor byed //
T07D4100-2:199b-19: ces bya ba ni lus sbyong ba'am brgyan par byed pa de thub pa'i cha byad kyis so //
T07D4100-2:199b-20: 'o na bram ze de dag ral pa la sogs
T07D4100-2:199b-21: pa'i rtags kyis dag par 'gyur zhes 'dod na ci
T07D4100-2:199b-22: ral pa la sogs pa dang ldan pas yin nam
T07D4100-2:199b-23: zhe na / de'i phyir rigs kyi bram ze zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T07D4100-2:199b-24: bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du ral pa can zhig
T07D4100-2:199b-25: chu bo dza ya rgal te 'ongs nas mdun du
T07D4100-2:199b-26: 'dug ste / kye goo ta ma ral pa can
T07D4100-2:199b-27: ni rigs kyi bram ze lags so zhes gsol ba
T07D4100-2:199b-28: 'dug ste / dang / des na tshigs su bcad
T07D4100-2:199b-29: pa 'di gnyis gsungs te thos pas mngon par ngad
T07D4100-2:199b-30: cing rab tu byung nas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu
T07D4100-2:199b-31: 'dug ste / dang / thob po // bram ze
T07D4100-2:199b-32: ni yon tan bsags pa nyid kyis yang dag par
T07D4100-2:199b-33: 'gyur gyi la ba 'chang ba la sogs pa ni
T07D4100-2:199b-34: ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'dir bsdus pa'i
T07D4100-2:199b-35: 'dug ste / dang / thob po // don no
T07D4100-2:199b-36: // rus kyis zhes bya ba ni bu dang tsha
T07D4100-2:199b-37: bo la sogs pa'i rgyud kyi tshul gyi rigs rgyud
T07D4100-2:199b-38: 'dug ste / dang / thob po // don no
T07D4100-2:199b-39: // kyis so // rigs kyis zhes bya ba ni
T07D4100-2:199b-40: gtso bo'i rigs dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:199b-41: rigs dang rus la sogs pa 'di dag ni kun
T07D4100-2:199b-42: rdzob tu yin gyi don dam par ni ma yin
T07D4100-2:199b-43: no zhes rab tu bstan cing gzhan gyi gnas mthong
T07D4100-2:199b-44: ba'i phyir tshul 'dis ni bram ze ma yin te
T07D4100-2:199b-45: / ji skad du rgyas par bshad pa /
T07D4100-2:199b-46: rigs kyis ma yin rus kyis ma yin zhing //
T07D4100-2:199b-47: nor dang gzi brjid kyis kyang yod ma yin //
T07D4100-2:200a-0: @200a * // tshul la gnas pa gdol pa yin gyur kyang //
T07D4100-2:200a-1: g-yul ngor brtan pa de ni bram ze yin //
T07D4100-2:200a-2: bzod pa dul sogs sbyin pa dang //
T07D4100-2:200a-3: bden gtsang dran ldan snying rje can //
T07D4100-2:200a-4: yod lta bar ni shes mkhas pa //
T07D4100-2:200a-5: de 'dra bram ze'i mtshan nyid yin //
T07D4100-2:200a-6: bram ze'i las ni ma yin pa //
T07D4100-2:200a-7: gzhan la 'jug pa ltung ba yin //
T07D4100-2:200a-8: tshul 'chos phal cher ngan spyod ni //
T07D4100-2:200a-9: dmangs rigs gang zhig chos dul dang //
T07D4100-2:200a-10: bden dang rtag tu brtson 'grus can //
T07D4100-2:200a-11: de ni bram zer nga 'dod kyi //
T07D4100-2:200a-12: tshul min bram ze ma yin no //
T07D4100-2:200a-13: zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:200a-14: de lta na gang zhig bram ze yin zhe na /
T07D4100-2:200a-15: gang zhig bden dang chos ldan pa //
T07D4100-2:200a-17: bden pa ni phyin ci ma log pa'i tshig brjod pa'o //
T07D4100-2:200a-18: chos ni mi 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid de srog chags
T07D4100-2:200a-19: la sogs pa gzhan la gnod pa spangs pa'i phyir
T07D4100-2:200a-21: rta bsad mchod sbyin stong phrag dang //
T07D4100-2:200a-22: bden pa de ni mtshungs tshul te //
T07D4100-2:200a-23: gang phyir rta bsad stong dag pas //
T07D4100-2:200a-24: bden pa nyid ni khyad par 'phags //
T07D4100-2:200a-25: 'tshe med mtshan nyid chos yin te //
T07D4100-2:200a-26: mchod sbyin srog chags gsod pa'o //
T07D4100-2:200a-27: de bas chos ni don gnyer des //
T07D4100-2:200a-28: srog chags dag la snying rje bya //
T07D4100-2:200a-29: rig byed mchod sbyin thams cad dang //
T07D4100-2:200a-30: stegs rnams kun du khrus byed dang /
T07D4100-2:200a-31: de kun thams cad mi bya ste /
T07D4100-2:200a-32: rgyas pa srog chags brtse smra bya //
T07D4100-2:200a-34: yang na bden pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi rtogs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:200a-35: chos de'i 'bras bu ni thar pa ste //
T07D4100-2:200a-36: de nyid ni gtsang ba zhes bya ba ngan par spyod pa'i dri ma spangs pa dang /
T07D4100-2:200a-37: legs pa spyod pa gsum dang ldan pa'i phyir te /
T07D4100-2:200a-38: khrus rnam pa gsum mo zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //
T07D4100-2:200a-39: bden gtsang dul ba gtsang ba dang //
T07D4100-2:200a-40: dbang bo char gcod gtsang ba dang //
T07D4100-2:200a-41: 'byung po rnams brtse gtsang ba ste //
T07D4100-2:200a-42: chu yis bkrus pa lnga pa yin //
T07D4100-2:200a-43: phyi yi dri ma 'khru ba dang //
T07D4100-2:200a-44: skom pa sel ba yin gyur kyang /
T07D4100-2:200a-45: chu yis nang gi dri ma ni //
T07D4100-2:200a-46: spong bar byed pa mi srid do //
T07D4100-2:200a-48: bud med kyi ni dbang 'gro bas //
T07D4100-2:200a-49: stegs la brgyar ni khrus byas kyang //
T07D4100-2:200a-50: de yis de ni dag mi 'gyur //
T07D4100-2:200a-51: bram ze de zhes bya ba ni sdig pa spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:200b-0: de la re zhig rigs pa ni gang de ji ltar @200b gtsang bar 'gyur ba yin zhe na //
T07D4100-2:200b-1: ral pas ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:200b-2: gang zhig spong bar byed pa zhes bya ba ni //
T07D4100-2:200b-3: gang gis phyi rol du byas shing spangs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:200b-4: sdig pa ni nyes par spyod pa'o //
T07D4100-2:200b-5: che chung ni phra rags so //
T07D4100-2:200b-6: thams cad ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa'o //
T07D4100-2:200b-7: sdig pa rnams ni spangs phyir de ;
T07D4100-2:200b-8: / zhes bya ba ni yongs su spangs pa ste /
T07D4100-2:200b-10: nyid kyi tshul gyis ni dge sbyong dang bram zer
T07D4100-2:200b-11: gdags pa ni rigs kyi gzhan du ni ma yin
T07D4100-2:200b-13: mgo bregs zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:200b-14: gzhan zhig skra dang kha spu bregs nas bdag ni
T07D4100-2:200b-15: dge sbyong ngo zhes kun la shes par byed pa
T07D4100-2:200b-16: dang gzhan zhig ni rig byed 'don par byed cing
T07D4100-2:200b-17: bdag ni bram ze'o zhes shes par byed de /
T07D4100-2:200b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lho phyogs kyi lam
T07D4100-2:200b-19: zhes 'ongs pa dang de gnyis kyi dbang du mdzad
T07D4100-2:200b-21: mgo bregs tsam zhes bya ba ni lus kyi yan
T07D4100-2:200b-22: lag mgo bregs pa tsam gyis ni dge sbyong du
T07D4100-2:200b-24: 'dod chags dang mya ngan la sogs pa ma spyad pa'i khyim pa dag kyang yod pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:200b-25: aom zhes bya ba ni aom bhur bhu ba: sva:
T07D4100-2:200b-26: zhes bya ba la sogs pa sde ba sbyor 'don
T07D4100-2:200b-27: pa tsam gyis ni bram ze ma yin te sha
T07D4100-2:200b-28: ri ka la sogs pa la yang de 'don pa
T07D4100-2:200b-30: de lta na bram ze dang dge sbyong du gdags pa'i rgyu gang yin zhe na /
T07D4100-2:200b-31: gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T07D4100-2:200b-32: rab tu byung ba ni bden pa la dgongs pa yin te /
T07D4100-2:200b-33: de dang ldan pa ni dge sbyong du gdags par 'os pa yin no //
T07D4100-2:200b-34: gang la mi 'tshe ba'i bdag nyid kyi chos yod pa de ni bram ze zhes brjod do //
T07D4100-2:200b-35: gnyis ka'i ming ni gnyis ka'i rgyus so //
T07D4100-2:200b-36: gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa ni bshad zin to //
T07D4100-2:200b-37: sdig pa spangs pa dang yon tan bsags pa nyid
T07D4100-2:200b-38: kyis bram zer 'gyur gyi stegs la khrus bya ba
T07D4100-2:200b-39: la sogs pas ni ma yin no zhes bstan pa'i
T07D4100-2:200b-40: phyir / skye bo phal cher zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T07D4100-2:200b-41: bcom ldan 'das ga ya mgo'i mchod rten na bzhugs te /
T07D4100-2:200b-42: de'i tshe ga ya na dpyid zla ra ba'i dga'
T07D4100-2:200b-43: ston gyi tshe srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po
T07D4100-2:200b-44: sdig pa spyang ba'i phyir khrus byed de des na
T07D4100-2:200b-45: 'dis gsungs so zhes gzhan dag zer ro //
T07D4100-2:201a-1: zhes bya ba ni chus dri ma dag pa dang /
T07D4100-2:201a-2: sdig pa med par mi 'gyur ro //
T07D4100-2:201a-4: 'di ltar skye bo phal cher 'dir 'khru ba zhes smos te /
T07D4100-2:201a-6: de dag ni ma dag pa yin te /
T07D4100-2:201a-7: der 'khru ba de dag ni bye brag med par snang bas so //
T07D4100-2:201a-8: gal te stegs kyi chus sdig pa sel par 'gyur na ni bsod nams kyang sel bar 'gyur la /
T07D4100-2:201a-9: sdig pa sel bas ni de'i 'bras bu dang yang bral bar 'gyur te /
T07D4100-2:201a-10: rtsa ba nas chad pas shing gi lhag ma zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
T07D4100-2:201a-11: de bas na rigs pas ni sdig pa dag par mi 'gyur te /
T07D4100-2:201a-12: khrus la sogs pas de'i gzhi ma 'gags pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:201a-13: de ltar na gang gis dag par 'gyur zhe na /
T07D4100-2:201a-14: lam khyad par can bsgoms pas de'i sdig pa spangs par 'gyur te /
T07D4100-2:201a-15: mun nag sgron mes sel bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du dag par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T07D4100-2:201a-16: gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T07D4100-2:201a-17: yang gi sgra ni tshul 'di nyid kyis 'gyur zhing gzhan gyis ma yin par bstan pa'o //
T07D4100-2:201a-18: lhag ma'i don ni bshad pa nyid do //
T07D4100-2:201a-19: de la don dam pa'i dge sbyong la sogs pa de dag gang yin zhe na /
T07D4100-2:201a-20: gang zhig sdig chos zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T07D4100-2:201a-21: pus ka r'a s'a ri zhes bya ba'i bram zes
T07D4100-2:201a-22: bcom ldan 'das la btsun pa glang po che rnams
T07D4100-2:201a-23: kyi nang na glang po che cang shes dang /
T07D4100-2:201a-24: rta rnams kyi nang na rta cang shes dang /
T07D4100-2:201a-25: shing rnams kyi nang na dpag bsam gyi shing dang /
T07D4100-2:201a-26: nor rnams kyi nang na rin po che la sogs pa bzhin du /
T07D4100-2:201a-27: btsun pa dge sbyong dang bram ze rnams kyi nang
T07D4100-2:201a-28: na mchog dang gtso bo gang lags zhes bya ba
T07D4100-2:201a-29: la sogs pa zhus pa las 'di gsungs so //
T07D4100-2:201a-30: rab spangs zhes bya ba ni rjes su mthun pa'i gnyen pos spangs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07D4100-2:201a-32: sdig pa zhes bya ba ste mi 'dod pa'i 'bras
T07D4100-2:201a-33: bu dang mi 'dod pa'i rang gi ngo bo zhes
T07D4100-2:201a-36: gzhan la gnod pa byed pa la sogs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:201a-37: spangs nas ji zhig byed pa yin zhe na /
T07D4100-2:201a-38: gang zhig spyod byed pa zhes bya ba smos te /
T07D4100-2:201a-39: gzhan la phan 'dogs par mdzad la gnas shing bzhugs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:201b-0: ji lta bu dang ldan pas she @201b na /
T07D4100-2:201b-1: rtag tu dran ldan zhes bya ba smos te /
T07D4100-2:201b-2: rgyun du yang dag pa'i dran pa mngon du byed pa ste /
T07D4100-2:201b-3: thugs rje chen po'i dbang gis gzhan gyi don du dgongs pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07D4100-2:201b-4: gang yin zhe na de nyid smras pa /
T07D4100-2:201b-5: kun sbyor zad pa zhes bya ba yin te /
T07D4100-2:201b-6: bag chags dang bcas pa'i phra rgyas spangs pa ste /
T07D4100-2:201b-7: phun sum tshogs par bstan to //
T07D4100-2:201b-8: sangs rgyas ni thams cad mkhyen pa ste /
T07D4100-2:201b-9: lhag par rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:201b-10: gang gi phyir des ni dngos po thams cad thugs su chud pa ste /
T07D4100-2:201b-11: des sngon 'jig rten pa'i lam gyi nyes par spyod
T07D4100-2:201b-12: pa bkag nas gzhan gyi don mdzad pas bsod nams
T07D4100-2:201b-13: dang ye shes kyi tshogs la brten te spangs pa
T07D4100-2:201b-14: dang ye shes phun sum tshogs pa thob pa'o //
T07D4100-2:201b-15: de zhes bya ba ni de nyid do //
T07D4100-2:201b-16: 'jig rten dag na zhes bya ba ni srid pa gsum na'o //
T07D4100-2:201b-17: bram ze yin zhes bya ba ni bram ze dang
T07D4100-2:201b-18: dge sbyong thams cad kyi nang na gtso bo zhes
T07D4100-2:201b-20: gang bram ze'i mtshan nyid dang yang dag par ldan
T07D4100-2:201b-21: pa ni tshogs kyi nang du nga ni bram ze'o
T07D4100-2:201b-22: zhes smra bar rigs kyi gzhan ni ma yin zhes
T07D4100-2:201b-23: bstan pa'i phyir / bram ze gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T07D4100-2:201b-24: dro na zhes bya ba'i bram zes bcom ldan 'das
T07D4100-2:201b-25: bram ze'am dge slong gang bdag nyid shes shing yang
T07D4100-2:201b-26: dag par rab tu shes pa lags /
T07D4100-2:201b-27: rigs kyi bram ze ni bram ze lags so zhes
T07D4100-2:201b-28: bram ze dag de ltar smra bas smra par bgyid
T07D4100-2:201b-29: na bram zes gang zhig la blta bar bgyi zhes
T07D4100-2:201b-30: gsol pa dang / sdig pa'i chos spangs shing zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ste /
T07D4100-2:201b-31: spangs pa ni bor pa ste sdig pa'i chos ngan pa'i ngo bo gang yin pa de nyid do //
T07D4100-2:201b-33: tshul 'chos med ces bya ba ste /
T07D4100-2:201b-34: tshul 'chos ni ngo mtshar skyed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07D4100-2:201b-35: gang gis ngo mtshar skyed cing des kyang rnyed pa
T07D4100-2:201b-36: dang bkur sti sgrub par byed de rig byed kyi
T07D4100-2:201b-37: yan lag khyim pa brtag pa la sogs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:201b-38: gang gis tshul 'chos pa yod pa ma yin pa
T07D4100-2:201b-39: de ni ma yin pa ste nor 'thob pa'i phyir
T07D4100-2:201b-40: log pa'i thabs la dmigs pa'i tshul 'chos med pa'i
T07D4100-2:201b-41: phyir ro // rnyog med ces bya ba ni 'dod
T07D4100-2:201b-42: chags dang 'brel ba'i lus la sogs pa'i las kyi
T07D4100-2:201b-43: bgegs pa skyed par 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
T07D4100-2:202a-0: @202a * // gang de ni 'khrig pa nyams su myong ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:202a-1: tshig gnyis po 'dis ni 'dod pa'i khams las 'dod chags dang bral bar bstan to //
T07D4100-2:202a-2: bdag gnas zhes bya ba la gnas pa ni mi
T07D4100-2:202a-3: g-yo ba'i bdag gi sems gang yin de nyid do
T07D4100-2:202a-4: // gzugs kyi khams na ni dga' ba la sogs
T07D4100-2:202a-5: pa tshor ba'i dbang gis sems g-yo ba yin te
T07D4100-2:202a-6: // / de las 'dod chags dang bral na ni
T07D4100-2:202a-7: sems brtan pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes ston to
T07D4100-2:202a-8: // / // rig byed mthar phyin zhes bya ba
T07D4100-2:202a-9: ni tshor ba zad pa ni rig byed kyi mtha'
T07D4100-2:202a-10: // / // ste / der 'gro ba ni rig byed kyi mthar phyin pa'o //
T07D4100-2:202a-11: tshor ba zad pa 'thob pa ni srid pa'i rtse mo las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:202a-12: sngar bstan pa mtha' dag kyang 'phags pa'i lam nyid kyis byed pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir //
T07D4100-2:202a-13: tshangs par spyod pa spyad ces bya ba la /
T07D4100-2:202a-14: spyod pa ni gsos par bya ba ste /
T07D4100-2:202a-15: tshangs par spyod pa ni gang thar pa'i lam de nyid la spyod pa'o //
T07D4100-2:202a-16: de nyid bdag gi don yongs su rdzogs pa yin
T07D4100-2:202a-17: yang bram ze bdag nyid du ston pa ni mi
T07D4100-2:202a-18: mdzes pa ste / 'on kyang don dam par byed pa 'di nyid bstan pa yin te /
T07D4100-2:202a-19: dus su zhes bya ba smos pa la don dam par sgrub pa ste /
T07D4100-2:202a-20: dus gzhan na zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07D4100-2:202a-21: de ni zhes bya ba ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:202a-22: tshangs pa smra ba zhes bya ba ni bdag ni tshangs pa'o zhes brjod cing ston pa'o //
T07D4100-2:202a-23: smra byed ces bya ba ni ci 'dod cing bag yongs su smra ba'o //
T07D4100-2:202a-24: gzhan yang rnam pa gzhan gyis dge sbyong la sogs par smra ba'i rgyu bshad pa /
T07D4100-2:202a-25: gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:202a-26: yul b'a r'a na s'ir chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
T07D4100-2:202a-27: nas ring po ma lon par dge slong lnga pos
T07D4100-2:202a-28: bcom ldan 'das la btsun pa don dam dge slong
T07D4100-2:202a-29: zhes gang la bgyi zhes bya ba la sogs pa
T07D4100-2:202a-31: gang zhig ni sems can no //
T07D4100-2:202a-32: sgyu la mi gnas zhes bya ba ni gzhan slu ba la mi gnas pa ste /
T07D4100-2:202a-33: sgyu dang ldan pa ma yin zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07D4100-2:202a-34: nga rgyal med pa zhes bya ba ni mtho ba'i dregs pa med pa'o //
T07D4100-2:202a-35: ci'i phyir de ltar med pa yin zhe na /
T07D4100-2:202a-36: gang zhig chags med ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T07D4100-2:202a-37: chags pa dang bral ba ni 'di ltar bdag med pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:202b-0: @202b chags pa dang bral ba'i phyir sgyu la mi gnas pa'o //
T07D4100-2:202b-1: gang gi phyir gyi sgra ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba med pa'i phyir bdag med pa'o //
T07D4100-2:202b-2: bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i dbang gis ni nga rgyal 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:202b-3: tshe 'di'i sred pa dang bral bar gyur na sred
T07D4100-2:202b-4: pa gzhan gyi sred pa yang bcad pa yin no
T07D4100-2:202b-6: re ba med ces bya ba smos te yang srid
T07D4100-2:202b-7: pa 'dren par byed pa'i gang gi sred pa med
T07D4100-2:202b-8: pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07D4100-2:202b-9: 'khrug bcom zhes bya ba ni zhe sdang spangs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:202b-10: de tsam gyis dge sbyong gi ming du mi 'gyur
T07D4100-2:202b-11: ro zhes bsgrub pa'i phyir yang gi sgra de dge
T07D4100-2:202b-12: sbyong byed pa'i chos bzhi zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro
T07D4100-2:202b-13: // mya ngan 'das phyogs zhes bya ba ni mngon
T07D4100-2:202b-14: par 'dod pa'i lam gyis mya ngan las 'das shing
T07D4100-2:202b-15: bdag nyid gdung ba med pa gang yin pa ste
T07D4100-2:202b-16: // / khams gsum las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir /
T07D4100-2:202b-17: de nyid bram ze zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:202b-18: 'o na ni gang zhig mngal nas ma skyes pa
T07D4100-2:202b-19: yang bram zer brjod pa nyid do zhes bstan to
T07D4100-2:202b-20: / gang zhig ma'i mngal zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:202b-21: mnyan yod na bil ba ra ma'i rigs kyi bram
T07D4100-2:202b-22: ze bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin te 'di
T07D4100-2:202b-24: kye goo ta ma bdag ni ma'i mngal nas bram ze dang ldan pa yin no zhes pa dang /
T07D4100-2:202b-25: tshigs su bcad pa gsungs so //
T07D4100-2:202b-26: mngal nas skyes pa 'am mngal gyi skye gnas pa ni mngal nas skyes pa ste /
T07D4100-2:202b-27: rum du gnas nas mngal nas skyes pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07D4100-2:202b-28: gzhan thams cad kyang de ltar bram ze ma yin te /
T07D4100-2:202b-29: lus 'byung bar ni mtshungs pa'i phyir ji skad du bshad pa /
T07D4100-2:202b-30: sa bon khrag dang khu ba ltor mi gtsang ba'i
T07D4100-2:202b-31: gnas su gnas pa ste mngal gyi dri mas yongs
T07D4100-2:202b-32: su bsgos pa'i lam gang dang ldan pa nas byung
T07D4100-2:202b-33: zhing de la nad dang rga ba dang phongs pas
T07D4100-2:202b-34: nyams pa'i nyon mongs pa'i gzhi ye shes kyi mes
T07D4100-2:202b-35: bsregs pa ma gtogs par lus kyis ni ji zhig
T07D4100-2:202b-36: dag par 'gyur smros shig dang zhes so //
T07D4100-2:202b-37: mngal nas skyes pa de ni bram ze'i yin par mi smra ste /
T07D4100-2:202b-38: smad 'tshong ma la sogs pa bzhin no //
T07D4100-2:202b-39: mngal nas skyes pa yin par ga las nges par bya zhe na /
T07D4100-2:202b-40: ma las skyes pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir te /
T07D4100-2:203a-1: ba zhes bya ba ma las yang dag par byung ba ni kun du skyes pa'o //
T07D4100-2:203a-2: gang ma dang pha las skyes pa de ni mngal nas nges par skyes pa yin no //
T07D4100-2:203a-3: gang yang mngal nas skyes pa de ji ltar dag par 'gyur /
T07D4100-2:203a-4: gang ma dag pa de bram zer ji ltar 'gyur /
T07D4100-2:203a-5: 'o na de yang rig byed 'don pas bram ze yin no zhe na bshad pa /
T07D4100-2:203a-6: gal te 'dzin pa dang bcas nas //
T07D4100-2:203a-7: zhes bya ba yongs su 'dzin pa gal te yod par gyur na'o //
T07D4100-2:203a-8: de ming lta bu zhes smra par bstan zhes bya
T07D4100-2:203a-9: ba ni bhur bhu ba zhes bya ba la sogs
T07D4100-2:203a-10: pa smra ba'i tshul gang la yod pa de nyid
T07D4100-2:203a-11: ni ming du brjod pa ste de bram ze ma
T07D4100-2:203a-12: yin no // de lta na gang zhig bram ze yin zhing bram zer brjod par bya zhe na /
T07D4100-2:203a-13: yongs su 'dzin med ces smos te ci yang 'dzin pa med pa'o //
T07D4100-2:203a-14: len med ces bya ba ni len pa spangs pa ste /
T07D4100-2:203a-16: las mtha' dag spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:203a-17: gang legs par spyod pa mchog tu byed pa de ni bram ze yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T07D4100-2:203a-18: gang zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T07D4100-2:203a-19: lus la sogs pa'i nyes par spyod pa med pa ste /
T07D4100-2:203a-20: sdom pas bsdams pa'i legs par spyod pa dang ldan par bstan to //
T07D4100-2:203a-21: legs bsdams zhes bya ba ni sdom pa dang ldan pa'o //
T07D4100-2:203a-22: gnas gsum zhes bya ba ni lus la sogs pa'i rnam pa'o //
T07D4100-2:203a-23: yang na so sor thar pa dang bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa'o //
T07D4100-2:203a-24: gang tshig tsam gyis legs par sdom pa de yang bram ze yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T07D4100-2:203a-25: go byed ces bya ba smos te gang gis de
T07D4100-2:203a-26: bzhin nyid go bar byed pa bden pa zhes bya
T07D4100-2:203a-27: ba'i don to // mi rtsub ba ni yid tshim par byed pa ste /
T07D4100-2:203a-30: yid du 'ong ba ni snyan par yang dag par sbyor bar byed pa gang yin pa de ste /
T07D4100-2:203a-31: yid du 'ong ba ni mtshams sbyor bar byed pa
T07D4100-2:203a-32: dang phra ma med pa zhes bya ba'i don to
T07D4100-2:203a-33: // smra ba ni brjod pa dang ston pa'o //
T07D4100-2:203a-34: gang gis nyon mongs mi skyed de //
T07D4100-2:203a-35: zhes bya ba ni mngon par chags pa dang /
T07D4100-2:203a-36: zhe sdang gis sbyor bar mi byed pa'o //
T07D4100-2:203a-38: mkhas pas te rtogs pa po don dang ldan pa'i tshig tu ston pa yin te //
T07D4100-2:203a-39: 'brel pa med pa'i tshig gis ni mkhas pa dag gzhan 'khrug par mi byed do //
T07D4100-2:203b-0: yid kyi @203b legs par spyod pa gcig gis kyang bram zer 'gyur ba yin no zhes ston te /
T07D4100-2:203b-1: gang zhig 'ching ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:203b-2: gshe ba'i ba ra dhva dzas bcom ldan 'das thag
T07D4100-2:203b-3: ring po nas mthong ba las gshe bar gyur te
T07D4100-2:203b-4: 'di gsungs so // de nas de mngon par dad pa skyes te /
T07D4100-2:203b-5: khro med ces bya ba la la sogs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gsungs so //
T07D4100-2:203b-6: mngon du 'ongs te tshig rtsub po brjod cing gshe
T07D4100-2:203b-7: ba la gang dag bzod pa byed pa de ni
T07D4100-2:203b-8: bram ze yin par ngas gsungs so //
T07D4100-2:203b-9: gsod dang 'ching zhes bya ba la /
T07D4100-2:203b-10: gsod pa ni gsod pa nyid do //
T07D4100-2:203b-11: 'ching ba ni lcags sgrog la sogs pas gzhan gyi dbang du byed pa'o //
T07D4100-2:203b-12: de la bzod pa byed pa ni bzod pa ste /
T07D4100-2:203b-13: 'dis ni gzhan gyis gnod pa byas pa las ji mi snyam par bzod pa bstan to //
T07D4100-2:203b-14: ji lta bur gyur pa las bzod par bya zhe na /
T07D4100-2:203b-15: sdang ba min pas zhes bya ba smos te khong
T07D4100-2:203b-16: khro ba la sogs pas yid nyams par ma byas
T07D4100-2:203b-17: pas yid dang du len cing bzod pa'o //
T07D4100-2:203b-18: des zil gyis mi gnon pa ni bram ze zhes brjod de /
T07D4100-2:203b-19: de nyid smras pa bzod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T07D4100-2:203b-20: bzod pa nyid brtul zhugs te /
T07D4100-2:203b-21: yon tan 'phel bar byed pa'i gnas yin pa'i phyir /
T07D4100-2:203b-22: bzod pa dka' thub dam pa zhes bshad do //
T07D4100-2:203b-23: de nyid dpung gi tshogs te /
T07D4100-2:203b-24: stobs dang ldan zhing sgrub pa 'di la yod pa de nyid do //
T07D4100-2:203b-25: dper na rgyal po dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi
T07D4100-2:203b-26: dang ldan pa ni gzhan gyis zil gyis mi gnon
T07D4100-2:203b-27: cing gzhan rnam par gnon par byed pa de bzhin
T07D4100-2:203b-28: du bzod pa'i brtul zhugs dang ldan zhing 'byor par
T07D4100-2:203b-29: gyur pas ni sdig pas zil gyis mi non cing
T07D4100-2:203b-30: 'jig rten gsum las rgyal bar yang byed do //
T07D4100-2:203b-31: khro ba med cing zhes bya ba ni khro ba ma yin pas khro ba med pa ste /
T07D4100-2:203b-32: bzod pa'i khyad par dang ldan pas so //
T07D4100-2:203b-33: tshul khrims can zhes bya bas ni so sor thar
T07D4100-2:203b-34: pa'i sdom pa dang yang dag par ldan pa ste
T07D4100-2:203b-35: / 'dis ni khro ba'am 'gyur ba med pa'i thabs bstan to //
T07D4100-2:203b-36: brtul zhugs ldan zhing zhes bya ba ni yang dag par blang ba dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:203b-37: 'dis ni tshul khrims dag par bstan to //
T07D4100-2:203b-38: sems khral med ces bya ba ni yul dag la
T07D4100-2:203b-39: chags pa dang bral bas dga' ba med ces bya
T07D4100-2:204a-1: ni rab tu dben pa bstan to //
T07D4100-2:204a-2: dul ba ni dbang po dul pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:204a-3: lus mthar gnas zhes bya ba ni gang 'di lta
T07D4100-2:204a-4: bu de nyid ni srid pa tha mal rnam par
T07D4100-2:204a-6: 'dis ni khams gsum las 'dod chags dang bral bar bstan to //
T07D4100-2:204a-7: khro ba la sogs pa spangs par gyur na ni dben pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T07D4100-2:204a-8: gang zhig rab byung zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
T07D4100-2:204a-9: dge slong zhig bya rgod kyi phung po'i pi pa
T07D4100-2:204a-10: la'i phrag phug na tshogs kyis 'jigs shing gnas te
T07D4100-2:204a-12: 'dres pa dang ldan pa ni 'dre ba'o //
T07D4100-2:204a-13: de dgag pa ni mi 'dre par gnas pa ste /
T07D4100-2:204a-14: mi 'dre zhing gcig pu spyod pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07D4100-2:204a-15: gang dang 'dre ba yongs su spong ba yin zhe na /
T07D4100-2:204a-16: rab byung khyim pa dang zhes bya ba ste /
T07D4100-2:204a-17: khyim pa ni khyim gcig pa'o //
T07D4100-2:204a-18: rab tu byung ba ni khyim med pa'o //
T07D4100-2:204a-19: de bzhin gnyi ga zhes bya ba ni khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba gnyis so //
T07D4100-2:204a-20: 'di ltar la la ni khyim la mngon par dga'
T07D4100-2:204a-21: ste 'di lta ste mad tsha r'a nan da zhes
T07D4100-2:204a-23: la la ni gnyi ga la ste mgon med zas sbyin la sogs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:204a-24: dgon pa la yang gnas shing gtsug lag khang la
T07D4100-2:204a-25: sogs pa la yongs su 'dzin pa mchog tu byed
T07D4100-2:204a-26: pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T07D4100-2:204a-27: khyim nas ma byung zhes bya ba smos te /
T07D4100-2:204a-28: khyim nas byung ba'i ngang tshul 'di la yod pa
T07D4100-2:204a-29: ni khyim nas byung ba ste gnas nas nye bar
T07D4100-2:204a-31: gang de lta bu ma yin pa ni khyim nas
T07D4100-2:204a-32: ma byung ba ste gnas la mngon par mi dga'
T07D4100-2:204a-33: ba'i rnam pas lus dben pa bstan nas /
T07D4100-2:204a-36: chos gos ngan don tsam la sogs pas chog shes pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:204a-37: de ni tshogs na gnas kyang bram ze yin no zhes bstan to //
T07D4100-2:204a-38: gang sred pa dang de'i tshogs chas spangs pa de
T07D4100-2:204a-39: nyid kyis ni dben pa thob par nus so zhes
T07D4100-2:204a-40: bstan pa'i phyir / ma 'ongs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T07D4100-2:204a-41: mnyan yod na tshe dang ldan pa g-yul las rgyal
T07D4100-2:204a-42: pa zhes bya ba'i chung mas bu khye'u blangs te
T07D4100-2:204a-44: des de la ci yang ma smras pas de yang mi smra ste /
T07D4100-2:204a-45: khye'u de 'chag sa las mgo gtad de bzhag go //
T07D4100-2:204b-0: kho bo @204b rab tu byung ste chags pa dang
T07D4100-2:204b-1: bral lo zhes bya ba dang khye'u de blangs te
T07D4100-2:204b-2: song ba las de las brtsams nas tshigs su bcad
T07D4100-2:204b-4: ma 'ongs pa la zhes bya ba ni drung du 'ongs pa'i sngon gyi grogs po ste /
T07D4100-2:204b-5: de nye bar gyur cing sgrub pa'o //
T07D4100-2:204b-6: mngon par mi dga' ba zhes bya ba ni mngon
T07D4100-2:204b-7: par mi 'dod pa dang yid tshim par mi 'gyur
T07D4100-2:204b-8: ba ste / 'dod chags las skyes pa'i dga' ba
T07D4100-2:204b-9: nyams su myong bar mi byed ces bya ba'i don
T07D4100-2:204b-10: ba ste / to // 'das pa rnams la gdung med pa //
T07D4100-2:204b-11: zhes bya ba ni yid mi gdung zhing nang gi mya ngan sel bar mi byed pa'o //
T07D4100-2:204b-14: 'khrig pa ste 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang bral bas
T07D4100-2:204b-15: khyad par du g-yul las rgyal zhes bya ba yin
T07D4100-2:204b-16: te / rgyal po gzugs can snying po rgyal po
T07D4100-2:204b-17: ma skyes dgra las rgyal bar gyur pa na de
T07D4100-2:204b-18: skyes pas de ltar byas so //
T07D4100-2:204b-19: yang na nyon mongs pa'i dgra'i g-yul las rgyal ba dang bcom pa'i phyir te /
T07D4100-2:204b-20: khams gsum las 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:204b-21: yang na gang gi kun du 'ong ba ste lhag par ngan song gi ched du'o //
T07D4100-2:204b-22: de ni 'dir khyad par du sred pa yin par dgongs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07D4100-2:204b-24: mngon par mi dga' ba ni lhag par mi zhen cing spong bar byed la sel bar byed de /
T07D4100-2:204b-25: bdag la phan par 'dod pas ni shin tu bkres
T07D4100-2:204b-26: par gyur kyang kha zas shin tu dug dang bcas
T07D4100-2:204b-27: pa bzhin du rtogs par bya'o //
T07D4100-2:204b-28: 'das la zhes bya ba ni rgyud las kyang byung ba ste /
T07D4100-2:204b-30: gdung med ces bya ba ni de sdug bsngal du
T07D4100-2:204b-31: 'du shes pa'i phyir sdug bsngal gyi dngos po dang
T07D4100-2:204b-32: bral bas yang dag par dga' ba 'byung ba'i phyir
T07D4100-2:204b-33: ro // de gang yin zhe na /
T07D4100-2:204b-37: 'dis chags par byed pas na chags pa ste /
T07D4100-2:204b-38: thob par byed pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07D4100-2:204b-39: de spangs pa ni de'i spangs pas so //
T07D4100-2:204b-40: ji ltar de gdung ba med pa yin zhe na /
T07D4100-2:204b-41: 'di ltar de ni mya ngan med //
T07D4100-2:204b-43: de nyid nang gi gdung ba med pas de las ji ltar rjes su myong bar 'gyur /
T07D4100-2:204b-44: gang gi phyir me med par gyur na ni tsha
T07D4100-2:204b-45: ba 'ang med par 'gyur ba ltar mya ngan 'di
T07D4100-2:205a-1: rdul dang bral ba yin te /
T07D4100-2:205a-2: 'di nyid bstan pa rdul bral zhes te 'dod chags
T07D4100-2:205a-3: la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i rdul ni gdung ba
T07D4100-2:205a-5: de spangs ba ni de dang bral ba yin no //
T07D4100-2:205a-6: rdul thams cad bral bas ni 'khrug pa mtha' dag
T07D4100-2:205a-7: dang bral ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob
T07D4100-2:205a-9: zhi ba zhes bya ba ni phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:205a-10: ji skad du bshad pa'i sred pa la sogs pa

T07D4100-2:205a-33: bram ze dag kyang gral bar byed cing phyir yang rgal la /

T07D4100-2:205b-0: gzhan @205b dag ni rgyal byed kyi tshal na gang

T07D4100-2:205b-40: ze gnyis ring ba dang thung ba'i gos dag 'chang
T07D4100-2:206a-0: zhing 'khor dang bcas pa bdag nyid bram @206a *
T07D4100-2:206a-1: // ze yin no zhes sems bzhin du /

T07D4100-2:206a-11: gang zhig ni gang nyid do //

T07D4100-2:206a-14: dang sbyar ro // ring ba ni yun ring du bsags pa'o //

T07D4100-2:206a-17: gsal ba dang mi gsal bar byas pa yid dang lus kyis byas pa'i go rims bzhin no //
T07D4100-2:206a-18: yang na mnyam par bzhag pa dang /

T07D4100-2:206a-28: 'khor ba'i 'bras bu yang sdig pa bzhin du spang bar bya'o zhes byas nas so //
T07D4100-2:206a-29: mi len te zhes bya ba ni len pa med
T07D4100-2:206a-30: cing mi 'dzin pa med ces bya ba'i don to
T07D4100-2:206a-31: // gang la sred pa'i dbang gis ni nye bar len pa yin gyi /

T07D4100-2:206b-7: 'di nyid ces bya ba la sogs pa ste /

T07D4100-2:207a-43: smyung bu ste 'bigs par byed pa'i rtse mo la
T07D4100-2:207a-44: yungs kar mi gnas pa de bzhin du sdig pa

T07D4100-2:208a-10: tshigs su bcad pa gsum gsungs so //

T07D4100-2:220a-47: sgrib pa de'i bdag nyid ces bya ba'i don to
T07D4100-2:220a-48: // gal te de snod ma yin par gyur na
T07D4100-2:220b-0: ni yul dang dus la gzigs te bcom ldan @220b
T07D4100-2:220b-1: 'das de las ldog pa yin no //
T07D4100-2:220b-2: yang na ji lta ji ltar zhes bya ba ni
T07D4100-2:220b-3: 'di nyid las te de lta de ltar khro ba
T07D4100-2:220b-4: las yid ldog pa yin no //
T07D4100-2:220b-5: yang na sems can bden pa rtogs pa'i snod du
T07D4100-2:220b-6: ma gyur par thub pa mchog gis thugs su chud
T07D4100-2:220b-7: nas bstan pa nyid las ldog pa yin no //
T07D4100-2:220b-8: 'dis ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa bstan to //
T07D4100-2:220b-9: chags par khye'u bzhag par gyur kyang de la ltos
T07D4100-2:220b-10: pa med par 'gro ba'i skye ba la ni 'jig
T07D4100-2:220b-11: rten pa smod par byed do //
T07D4100-2:220b-12: tshe dang ldan pa g-yul las rgyal gyis de las
T07D4100-2:220b-13: 'das par byas nas kyang rnam par ldang bar mi
T07D4100-2:220b-14: byed do zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:220b-15: 'di ltar 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams ni sdug pa dang mi sdug pa med de /
T07D4100-2:220b-16: 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'jug pas ni gang nas
T07D4100-2:220b-17: kyang 'jug par mi byed cing 'jig rten gyi bag
T07D4100-2:220b-19: yang na ji lta ji ltar ni ji srid ji srid kyi don te /
T07D4100-2:220b-20: gang gi phyi ji srid ji srid gdul bya'i sgrib
T07D4100-2:220b-21: pa nyid yod pa de srid de srid du yid
T07D4100-2:220b-22: ldog par 'gyur gyi gzhan nyon mongs pa'i rgyus ni
T07D4100-2:220b-24: skal ba dang ldan pa dag ni bcom ldan 'das
T07D4100-2:220b-25: kyi bstan pa la brten nas dngos po'i de bzhin
T07D4100-2:220b-26: nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs te /
T07D4100-2:220b-27: mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu thob pa yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
T07D4100-2:220b-28: gang tshe bram ze zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T07D4100-2:220b-29: de nas bcom ldan 'das mngon par dga' ba'i klu'i
T07D4100-2:220b-30: rgyal po btang bzung gi khang pa na bzhugs pa
T07D4100-2:220b-31: las byang chub kyi shing drung ga la ba der
T07D4100-2:220b-32: gshegs te rtsva'i gdan bshams pa la skyil mo krung
T07D4100-2:220b-33: bcas te bzhugs nas zhag bdun skyil mo krung la
T07D4100-2:220b-34: ma g-yos pa nyid du rten cing 'brel bar 'byung
T07D4100-2:220b-35: ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis lugs su 'byung ba dang
T07D4100-2:220b-36: lugs las bzlog pa 'di nyid la rnam par gzigs
T07D4100-2:220b-37: te ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas tshigs su
T07D4100-2:220b-39: gang tshe ni dus gang na'o //
T07D4100-2:220b-40: 'di zhes bya ba ni chos gang sngar zhag bdun
T07D4100-2:220b-41: du gzigs pa de rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i
T07D4100-2:220b-43: rab tu 'byung 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni rab
T07D4100-2:220b-44: tu gsal zhing snang bar 'gyur te de kho na
T07D4100-2:220b-45: nyid kyi shes pas yongs su bzung ba dang nges
T07D4100-2:220b-46: par byas pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
T07D4100-2:220b-47: de skye ba ni ma yin te skye ba med pas so //
T07D4100-2:220b-48: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni skye ba med pa'i
T07D4100-2:220b-49: chos la gnas pa'o zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so
T07D4100-2:221a-1: ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud la gnas pa'i yon
T07D4100-2:221a-2: tan te mthong pa'i lam la brtsams nas zad pa
T07D4100-2:221a-3: shes pa'i ye shes thob pa dang /
T07D4100-2:221a-4: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sogs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:221a-5: rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bya ba ni rgyud
T07D4100-2:221a-6: la spyod pa ste mngon du gyur cing thob pa'o
T07D4100-2:221a-7: ; / gang la 'dis dang por 'byung bar 'gyur zhe na /
T07D4100-2:221a-8: bram ze zhes bya ba dang sbyar bar bya'o //
T07D4100-2:221a-9: de ji lta bu zhe na /
T07D4100-2:221a-10: khyad par gyi tshul gyis bla na med pa'i yon
T07D4100-2:221a-11: tan rab tu 'byung ba'i rgyu bsod nams dang ye
T07D4100-2:221a-12: shes kyi tshogs bstan pa'i phyir /
T07D4100-2:221a-13: brtson pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
T07D4100-2:221a-14: rtag tu byed pa dang gus pa'i sbyor ba gnyis
T07D4100-2:221a-15: kyis myur du byed pa las lhag par spro zhing
T07D4100-2:221a-16: brtun pa gang la yod pa ni /
T07D4100-2:221a-18: 'dis ni bsod nams kyi tshogs bstan te brtson 'grus 'di las rgyal ba'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:221a-19: bram ze zhes bya ba ni bdag nyid ston pa'i
T07D4100-2:221a-20: phyir 'dis bstan pa ste bstan ma thag pa'i tshigs
T07D4100-2:221a-21: bcad la yang bram ze'i sgo nas de bzhin gshegs
T07D4100-2:221a-22: pa'i skabs su shes par bya'o //
T07D4100-2:221a-24: brtson 'grus kyis ni dka' ba gang yang med de /
T07D4100-2:221a-25: de bas na brtson 'grus brtsams pa mi 'dor bar bya'o //
T07D4100-2:221a-26: ye shes kyi tshogs smras pa /
T07D4100-2:221a-27: sems pa dang zhes bya ba ste ting nge 'dzin
T07D4100-2:221a-28: bsgom pa 'dis ni shes rab kyi pha rol du
T07D4100-2:221a-29: phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa yin te /
T07D4100-2:221a-30: shes rab med na ting nge 'dzin med do zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so //
T07D4100-2:221a-31: de tshe zhes bya ba la tshig gi phrad ni sna tshogs pa yin pa'i phyir de'i tshe'am /
T07D4100-2:221a-32: yang na de ma thag pa'i don te bsod nams
T07D4100-2:221a-33: dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi tha ma de ma
T07D4100-2:221a-34: thag ces bya ba'i don to //
T07D4100-2:221a-35: de'i zhes bya ba ni bram ze thub pa mchog gis so //
T07D4100-2:221a-36: som nyi ma lus spong zhes bya ba ni yan
T07D4100-2:221a-37: lag bcu gnyis kyi the tshom thams cad rgyud la
T07D4100-2:221a-40: gang gis rab shes pa zhes bya ba ste /
T07D4100-2:221a-41: gang gis blang bar bya ba mngon par rtogs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:221a-43: chos rnams rgyur bcas zhes bya ba smos te /
T07D4100-2:221a-44: rgyu dang bcas pa'i chos ni rgyur bcas so //
T07D4100-2:221a-45: chos ni 'dir 'bras bu ste de yang 'jig rten
T07D4100-2:221a-46: dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dbye ba rnam pa
T07D4100-2:221a-47: gnyis so // 'jig rten pa'i ni sdug bsngal gyi bden pa'o //
T07D4100-2:221a-48: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni 'gog pa'i bden pa'o //
T07D4100-2:221b-0: rgyu ni kun 'byung dang lam @221b ste go rims bzhin no //
T07D4100-2:221b-1: yang na chos ni dor ba dang blang bar bya ba'i bdag nyid do //
T07D4100-2:221b-2: rgyu ni nye bar blang ba ste bden pa rnam pa bzhir 'gyur ro //
T07D4100-2:221b-3: de la 'dis ni mthong ba'i lam bstan to //
T07D4100-2:221b-4: rim pa gang gis mthong ba'i lam la 'jug pa de bstan pa ni /
T07D4100-2:221b-5: sdug bsngal rgyur bcas zhes bya ba yin te /
T07D4100-2:221b-6: sngon du sdug bsngal gyi bden pa rtogs nas phyis ni kun 'byung gi bden pa'o //
T07D4100-2:221b-7: de bzhin du sngar sdug bsngal las thar ba'i 'gog pa dang /
T07D4100-2:221b-8: de nas de'i rgyu lam mo //
T07D4100-2:221b-9: yang na gang gis bsgrub pa dang /
T07D4100-2:221b-10: gang gis thar ba don du gnyen ba des kyang
T07D4100-2:221b-11: dang por sdug bsngal gyi bden pa yongs su rtogs
T07D4100-2:221b-13: nad pa mthong nas de'i nad gzhi dang /
T07D4100-2:221b-15: sman tshol bar byed ba la sogs pa brjod par bya'o //
T07D4100-2:221b-16: de ltar tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis mthong ba'i
T07D4100-2:221b-17: lam bsgrubs nas tshigs su bcad ba gsum gyis bsgom
T07D4100-2:221b-19: gang tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
T07D4100-2:221b-20: 'o na bsgom pas spang bar bya ba la ni
T07D4100-2:221b-21: the tshom med na de ji ltar dang por som
T07D4100-2:221b-23: thag ring po'i dbang du byas pa'i phyir 'di la nyes pa med do //
T07D4100-2:221b-24: mthong ba'i lam ni nges par sdug bsngal sngon du rtogs pa yin no zhes brjod la /
T07D4100-2:221b-25: sdug bsngal de la yang rnam pa gsum du brjod
T07D4100-2:221b-26: pa las sdug bsngal shin tu drag cing rags pa
T07D4100-2:221b-28: 'dis ni tshor ba thams cad spangs pa nyid du rnal 'byor pa dag 'dod de /
T07D4100-2:221b-29: de bas na 'di nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
T07D4100-2:221b-30: gang gis tshor ba zad pa thob 'gyur ba //
T07D4100-2:221b-32: gang gi phyir 'dod pa las 'dod chags dang bral
T07D4100-2:221b-33: ba ni mi 'dod pa'i tshor ba thams cad zad
T07D4100-2:221b-34: pa yin te / 'dod pa na ni gsum char yang yod ba'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:221b-35: gang gi tshe tshor ba zad pa yin zhe na /
T07D4100-2:221b-36: gang gis rkyen rnams zad pa thob 'gyur ba //
T07D4100-2:221b-37: zhes bya ba 'di ste tshor ba'i rkyen ni reg
T07D4100-2:221b-38: pa la sogs pa ste reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
T07D4100-2:221b-39: ba zhes mdo las gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:221b-40: 'dis ni rtsa nas 'byin par 'gyur ba yin te gcig tu drungs 'byin pa'o zhes bstan to //
T07D4100-2:221b-41: mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa las 'dod chags dang bral
T07D4100-2:221b-42: ba bstan pas ni rkyen dang tshor ba thams cad
T07D4100-2:221b-45: gang gis zag pa zad pa thob 'gyur ba //
T07D4100-2:221b-46: zhes bya ba bsgoms pas phra rgyas thams cad spangs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T07D4100-2:221b-47: 'di man chad mi slob pa'i lam bstan te /
T07D4100-2:221b-48: gang tshe zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:221b-49: zag pa thams cad zad pa'i gnas skabs ni sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba yin te /
T07D4100-2:222a-0: mun pa la ni nyi mas rnam par snang bar byed pa lta bu'o zhes de nyid @222a * //
T07D4100-2:222a-2: snang byed ces smos te chos bstan pa'i snang bas so //
T07D4100-2:222a-3: dug 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni gdul bya'i don du zhugs pa'o //
T07D4100-2:222a-4: ji zhig snang bar byed pa yin zhe na /
T07D4100-2:222a-5: 'jig rten thams cad ces bya ba grogs po dang
T07D4100-2:222a-6: mdza' ba dang mi mdza' ba dag la ltos pa
T07D4100-2:222a-7: med par srid pa gsum po thams cad du'o //
T07D4100-2:222a-9: ji ltar nyi ma ltar zhes bya ba yin he
T07D4100-2:222a-10: dper na nyi ma nam mkha' bar snang sgrib pa
T07D4100-2:222a-11: med pa la shar cing gnas bas 'jig rten thams
T07D4100-2:222a-12: cad snang bar byed pa de bzhin no //
T07D4100-2:222a-13: gang zhig de ltar snang bar byed pa yin zhe na /
T07D4100-2:222a-14: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de nyid de bag chags
T07D4100-2:222a-15: dang bcas pa spangs pa thob pas thams cad mkhyen
T07D4100-2:222a-16: pa'i ye shes dang thugs rje chen po dang ldan
T07D4100-2:222a-17: pa de nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
T07D4100-2:222a-18: bdud kyi sde rnams bcom nas gnas 'gyur pa //
T07D4100-2:222a-20: bdud kyi sde dang tshogs las nges par rgyal ba
T07D4100-2:222a-21: ni bdud kyi sde bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa
T07D4100-2:222a-23: 'jig rten las yang dag pa nyid du nges par rgyal nas gnas pa'o //
T07D4100-2:222a-24: de ltar ga las nges par bya zhe na /
T07D4100-2:222a-25: blo yang kun skyed ces bya bas bstan te /
T07D4100-2:222a-26: gang gi phyir sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba'i
T07D4100-2:222a-27: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni ye shes khyad par
T07D4100-2:222a-28: can dang ldan pa'i phyir te /
T07D4100-2:222a-29: dam pa rnams ni blo'i khyad par gyis rgyal bar
T07D4100-2:222a-30: byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tshig gis so
T07D4100-2:222a-32: rva rtse sen mo so yis dgra dag la //
T07D4100-2:222a-33: phyugs rnams dag kyang 'thab mos rtsod par byed //
T07D4100-2:222a-34: 'di ni sems kyi rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis //
T07D4100-2:222a-35: gzhu ba dung med par yang ni dgra las rgyal bar byed //
T07D4100-2:222a-37: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa bstan nas /
T07D4100-2:222a-38: spangs pa phun sum tshogs pa bstan pa'i phyir /
T07D4100-2:222a-39: bcings las rnam grol zhing zhes bya ba yin te /
T07D4100-2:222a-40: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun du sbyor ba
T07D4100-2:222a-41: dgu bag chags dang bcas pa gnyen po khyad par
T07D4100-2:222a-42: can gyi sbyor bas gtan du spangs shing nyams pa
T07D4100-2:222a-43: med pa'i chos dang ldan pa nyid kyi phyir ro
T07D4100-2:222a-44: // bram ze'i tshoms te sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i rnam par 'grel pa rdzogs so /
T07D4100-2:222a-46: // / ched du brjod pa'i tshoms kyi rnam par 'grel
T07D4100-2:222a-47: pa yul ka ba dhyar skyes pa thos pa mang
T07D4100-2:222a-48: pa'i slob dpon bo dhi warma'i slob ma yul bham
T07D4100-2:222a-49: ga lar skye ba bzhes pa thams cad yod par
T07D4100-2:222a-50: smra pa'i slob dpon pra jny'a warmas mdzad ba rdzogs
T07D4100-2:222a-52: /'grel pa 'di la shlo ka stong phrag bcu gnyis
T07D4100-2:222a-53: dang lnga brgya yod do zhes rgya gar gyi yi
T07D4100-2:222a-54: ge las smos / rgya gar gyi mkhan po sgra'i
T07D4100-2:222a-55: gtsug lag la 'byam par mkhas pa pandi ta dza
